table.name: ADDRESS
table.remarks: Mailing address for a person, lab or organization. The same mailing address may be associated with more than one person.

column.name: STREET
column.remarks: stret name w/house building number.

column.name: STATE
column.remarks: state or province

column.name: POSTAL_CODE
column.remarks: potal, zip or other code appropriate to the country.

table.name: ADDRESS_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ADDRESS_incl_del_v (ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_LINE1, ADDRESS_LINE2, ADDRESS_LINE3, ADDRESS_LINE4, STREET, CITY, STATE, POSTAL_CODE, COUNTRY_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ADDRESS_ID, t.ADDRESS_LINE1, t.ADDRESS_LINE2, t.ADDRESS_LINE3, t.ADDRESS_LINE4, t.STREET, t.CITY, t.STATE, t.POSTAL_CODE, t.COUNTRY_ID, t.ORGANIZATION_ID, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ADDRESS t UNION SELECT a.ADDRESS_ID, a.ADDRESS_LINE1, a.ADDRESS_LINE2, a.ADDRESS_LINE3, a.ADDRESS_LINE4, a.STREET, a.CITY, a.STATE, a.POSTAL_CODE, a.COUNTRY_ID, a.ORGANIZATION_ID, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ADDRESS a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ADDRESS_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ADDRESS_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_LINE1, ADDRESS_LINE2, ADDRESS_LINE3, ADDRESS_LINE4, STREET, CITY, STATE, POSTAL_CODE, COUNTRY_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ADDRESS_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ALIGNED_PROBE_REL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.aligned_probe_rel_v AS (SELECT x.umbrella_gene_id , x.umbrella_gene_symbol, x.feature_id AS gene_id , x.name as gene_symbol, x.organism_id AS species_id, m.feature_id AS mRNA_id , p.feature_id AS probe_id , p.cdna_id, p.cdna_name , CAST('aligned probe' AS VARCHAR(20)) AS connection_type, coalesce(x.umbrella_gene_id,p.cdna_id) as expressed_feature_id, coalesce(x.umbrella_gene_symbol,p.cdna_name) as expressed_feature_name FROM xen_gene_v x INNER JOIN mrNA_v m ON x.feature_id = m.gene_id INNER JOIN feature_relationship fr ON m.feature_id = fr.object_id AND fr.type_id = 607 RIGHT OUTER JOIN full_cdna_probe_v p ON fr.subject_id = p.feature_id AND p.type_id = 553 WHERE ( x.umbrella_gene_id, p.feature_id ) NOT IN (SELECT umbrella_gene_id, probe_id FROM curated_gene_probe_rel_v ) )

table.name: ALL_ALIGNED_PROBE_REL_BV
table.viewSql: create view db2inst1.all_aligned_probe_rel_bv as (select * from curated_gene_probe_rel_v union select * from aligned_probe_rel_v)

table.name: ALL_ALIGNED_PROBE_REL_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for Aligned probe relationship

table.name: ALLOWABLE_SEARCH
table.remarks: This table stores the kinds of searches that can be generically performed in Xenbase, intially used in the attribution system

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.remarks: The table name of the source or the object that a given search can be performed on

column.name: ALT_VIEW_NAME
column.remarks: This is the name of a view to look in before we look at the tab name (that way results can be pre-filtered in a view to do things like remove built in types)

column.name: SEARCH_TYPE
column.remarks: This describes the type of searches that are possible on this tab_name or alt_view_name

column.name: USE_TEXT_INDEX
column.remarks: This boolean is true if we are search on a really big table and we want to use the faster text index search and not the nomral LIKE search

column.name: SEARCH_COLUMN
column.remarks: This is the column that we are going to search in (i.e. if we are searching in lab, and search_type is lab, then this column would be lab_id)

column.name: CUSTOM_SEARCH
column.remarks: This boolean is true if we are not going to use a generic search and need to look to a specialized search

table.name: ALLOWABLE_SEARCH_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ALLOWABLE_SEARCH_incl_del_v (TAB_NAME, ALT_VIEW_NAME, SEARCH_TYPE, USE_TEXT_INDEX, SEARCH_COLUMN, CUSTOM_SEARCH, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.TAB_NAME, t.ALT_VIEW_NAME, t.SEARCH_TYPE, t.USE_TEXT_INDEX, t.SEARCH_COLUMN, t.CUSTOM_SEARCH, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ALLOWABLE_SEARCH t UNION SELECT a.TAB_NAME, a.ALT_VIEW_NAME, a.SEARCH_TYPE, a.USE_TEXT_INDEX, a.SEARCH_COLUMN, a.CUSTOM_SEARCH, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ALLOWABLE_SEARCH a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ALLOWABLE_SEARCH_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ALLOWABLE_SEARCH_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (TAB_NAME, ALT_VIEW_NAME, SEARCH_TYPE, USE_TEXT_INDEX, SEARCH_COLUMN, CUSTOM_SEARCH, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ALLOWABLE_SEARCH_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANALYSIS_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSIS_incl_del_v (ANALYSIS_ID, NAME, PROGRAM, PROGRAMVERSION, ALGORITHM, SOURCENAME, SOURCEVERSION, SOURCEURI, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, TIMEEXECUTED,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANALYSIS_ID, t.NAME, t.PROGRAM, t.PROGRAMVERSION, t.ALGORITHM, t.SOURCENAME, t.SOURCEVERSION, t.SOURCEURI, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.TIMEEXECUTED, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSIS t UNION SELECT a.ANALYSIS_ID, a.NAME, a.PROGRAM, a.PROGRAMVERSION, a.ALGORITHM, a.SOURCENAME, a.SOURCEVERSION, a.SOURCEURI, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.TIMEEXECUTED,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANALYSIS a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANALYSIS_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSIS_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANALYSIS_ID, NAME, PROGRAM, PROGRAMVERSION, ALGORITHM, SOURCENAME, SOURCEVERSION, SOURCEURI, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, TIMEEXECUTED,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSIS_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANALYSISFEATURE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSISFEATURE_incl_del_v (ANALYSISFEATURE_ID, FEATURE_ID, ANALYSIS_ID, RAWSCORE, NORMSCORE, SIGNIFICANCE, IDENTITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANALYSISFEATURE_ID, t.FEATURE_ID, t.ANALYSIS_ID, t.RAWSCORE, t.NORMSCORE, t.SIGNIFICANCE, t.IDENTITY, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSISFEATURE t UNION SELECT a.ANALYSISFEATURE_ID, a.FEATURE_ID, a.ANALYSIS_ID, a.RAWSCORE, a.NORMSCORE, a.SIGNIFICANCE, a.IDENTITY, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANALYSISFEATURE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANALYSISFEATURE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSISFEATURE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANALYSISFEATURE_ID, FEATURE_ID, ANALYSIS_ID, RAWSCORE, NORMSCORE, SIGNIFICANCE, IDENTITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSISFEATURE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANALYSISPROP_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSISPROP_incl_del_v (ANALYSISPROP_ID, ANALYSIS_ID, TYPE_ID, VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANALYSISPROP_ID, t.ANALYSIS_ID, t.TYPE_ID, t.VALUE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSISPROP t UNION SELECT a.ANALYSISPROP_ID, a.ANALYSIS_ID, a.TYPE_ID, a.VALUE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANALYSISPROP a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANALYSISPROP_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANALYSISPROP_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANALYSISPROP_ID, ANALYSIS_ID, TYPE_ID, VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANALYSISPROP_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANATOMY_CATEGORY
table.remarks: Has categories for anatomy item terms. This is used for creating sub vocabularies.

table.name: ANATOMY_GENE_EXP_INSITU_AGGLST_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view anatomy_gene_exp_insitu_agglst_v as with show_tissue as ( select lstv.xao_rank, lstv.reccount, lstv.anatomyitem, lstv.xao_dbxref_id, lstv.anatomy_item_id from limit_show_tissue_v lstv ), m1 as ( select distinct t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id from db2inst1.anatomy_gene_exp_insitu_mqt t1 ), full_list as ( select t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , t2.xao_rank ,nvl(( select max(t3.reccount) from db2inst1.anatomy_gene_exp_insitu_mqt t3 where t3.organism_id = t1.organism_id and t3.umbrella_gene_id = t1.umbrella_gene_id and t3.anatomy_item_id = t2.anatomy_item_id ),0) reccount , t2.anatomyitem , t2.xao_dbxref_id from show_tissue t2, m1 t1 ) select t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , LISTAGG(t1.anatomyitem,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.xao_rank) header_counts , LISTAGG(t1.reccount,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.xao_rank) detail_counts from full_list t1 group by t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id

table.name: ANATOMY_GENE_EXP_INSITU_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for in situ hybridization Tissue data from gene_expression_complete

table.name: ANATOMY_IMAGE
table.remarks: stores the relationships between anatomy_item and images

table.name: ANATOMY_INHERITED_PARTS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.anatomy_inherited_parts_v AS select aip.root, aip.rootId, aip.base, aip.baseId, aip.anatomyItem as supertype, aip.anatomyItemId as supertypeId, a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, ar.rank from db2inst1.anatomy_supertypes_v aip join anatomy_rel ar on aip.anatomyItemId = ar.object_id AND ar.type_id = 2 join anatomy_item a on ar.subject_id = a.anatomy_item_id

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM
table.remarks: A type of anatomy item in a specific species or assigned to the umbrella speceis

column.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: primary key identifier for anatomy item

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: name of the tissues

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: description of the stage

column.name: ORGANISM_ID
column.remarks: id or the species that has the anatomy item

column.name: STARTS_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: stage in which the anatomy item begins formations

column.name: END_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: stage in which the anatomy item terminates

column.name: SUPERCLASS_ID
column.remarks: it for a tissue belonging to a super class of the species. This allows for the inheritance of of characteristics based on characteristics of the super class

column.name: ROOTCLASS_ID
column.remarks: The root of an anatomical hierarchy. This can be used to join records together in the same inheritance tree.

column.name: IS_OBSOLETE
column.remarks: indicates that that this name/definition for the tissue is obsolete.

column.name: IS_ROOT
column.remarks: Node is the root of the tree

column.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: primary key identifier for anatomy item

column.name: IS_ROOT
column.remarks: Node is the root of the tree for this category

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY_incl_del_v (ANATOMY_CATEGORY_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, IS_ROOT, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANATOMY_CATEGORY_ID, t.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, t.IS_ROOT, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY t UNION SELECT a.ANATOMY_CATEGORY_ID, a.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, a.IS_ROOT, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANATOMY_CATEGORY_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, IS_ROOT, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_incl_del_v (ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM_ID, STARTS_STAGE_ID, END_STAGE_ID, SUPERCLASS_ID, ROOTCLASS_ID, IS_OBSOLETE, IS_ROOT, DBXREF_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, t.NAME, t.DESCRIPTION, t.ORGANISM_ID, t.STARTS_STAGE_ID, t.END_STAGE_ID, t.SUPERCLASS_ID, t.ROOTCLASS_ID, t.IS_OBSOLETE, t.IS_ROOT, t.DBXREF_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM t UNION SELECT a.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, a.NAME, a.DESCRIPTION, a.ORGANISM_ID, a.STARTS_STAGE_ID, a.END_STAGE_ID, a.SUPERCLASS_ID, a.ROOTCLASS_ID, a.IS_OBSOLETE, a.IS_ROOT, a.DBXREF_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANATOMY_ITEM a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM_ID, STARTS_STAGE_ID, END_STAGE_ID, SUPERCLASS_ID, ROOTCLASS_ID, IS_OBSOLETE, IS_ROOT, DBXREF_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_ITEM_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_SUBPARTS_MQT
table.viewSql: create table db2inst1.anatomy_item_subparts_mqt AS ( with anatomy_item_subparts (root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name) AS ( select a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, a.anatomy_item_id subpart_id, a.name from anatomy_item a where is_obsolete = 0 UNION ALL select ais.root_name, ais.root_id, s.anatomy_item_id, s.name from anatomy_item s, anatomy_rel r, anatomy_item_subparts ais where s.anatomy_item_id = r.subject_id and r.type_id = 2 and s.is_obsolete = 0 and r.object_id = ais.anatomy_item_id ) select root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name from anatomy_item_subparts where root_id != anatomy_item_id ) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" NOT LOGGED INITIALLY ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_SUBPARTS_SUBTYPES_MQT
table.viewSql: CREATE TABLE db2inst1.anatomy_item_subparts_subtypes_mqt as ( with anatomy_item_subs (level,root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name) AS ( select 1,a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, a.anatomy_item_id subpart_id, a.name from anatomy_item a where is_obsolete = 0 UNION ALL select ais.level+1,ais.root_name, ais.root_id, s.anatomy_item_id, s.name from anatomy_item s, anatomy_rel r, anatomy_item_subs ais where s.anatomy_item_id = r.subject_id and r.type_id IN (1,2) and s.is_obsolete = 0 and r.object_id = ais.anatomy_item_id ) select level, root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name from anatomy_item_subs ) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" NOT LOGGED INITIALLY ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_SUBTYPES_MQT
table.viewSql: CREATE TABLE db2inst1.anatomy_item_subtypes_mqt as (with anatomy_item_subtypes (root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name) AS (select a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, a.anatomy_item_id subtype_id, a.name from anatomy_item a where is_obsolete = 0 UNION ALL select ast.root_name, ast.root_id, s.anatomy_item_id, s.name from anatomy_item s, anatomy_rel r, anatomy_item_subtypes ast where s.anatomy_item_id = r.subject_id and r.type_id = 1 and s.is_obsolete = 0 and r.object_id = ast.anatomy_item_id) select root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name from anatomy_item_subtypes) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" NOT LOGGED INITIALLY ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_SUCCESSORS_MQT
table.viewSql: create table db2inst1.anatomy_item_successors_mqt AS ( with anatomy_item_successors (level,root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name) AS ( select 1,a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, a.anatomy_item_id subtype_id, a.name from anatomy_item a where is_obsolete = 0 UNION ALL select ais.level+1,ais.root_name, ais.root_id, s.anatomy_item_id, s.name from anatomy_item s, anatomy_rel r, anatomy_item_successors ais where s.anatomy_item_id = r.subject_id and r.type_id = 3 and s.is_obsolete = 0 and r.object_id = ais.anatomy_item_id ) select level,root_name, root_id, anatomy_item_id, name from anatomy_item_successors where root_id != anatomy_item_id ) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" NOT LOGGED INITIALLY ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: ANATOMY_PATTERN_A_V
table.viewSql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "DB2INST1"."ANATOMY_PATTERN_A_V" ("EXPRESSIONASSAY_ID", "ANATOMY_ITEM_ID", "ANATOMY_ITEM", "BIOMEDIA_ID", "EXPRESSIONSTAGESTESTED_ID") AS select ea.expressionassay_id, ea.anatomy_item_id, a.name as anatomy_item , ea.biomedia_id --, b.biomedia_id , est.expressionstagestested_id from expressionassay ea, anatomy_item a --, biomedia b , expression_stages_tested est where ea.expressionstagestested_id=est.expressionstagestested_id --AND ea.biomedia_id=b.biomedia_id AND a.anatomy_item_id=ea.anatomy_item_id

table.name: ANATOMY_PATTERN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW anatomy_pattern_v as( select ea.expressionassay_id, ea.anatomy_item_id, a.name as anatomy_item, b.biomedia_id, est.expressionstagestested_id from expressionassay ea, anatomy_item a, biomedia b, expression_stages_tested est where ea.expressionstagestested_id=est.expressionstagestested_id AND ea.biomedia_id=b.biomedia_id AND a.anatomy_item_id=ea.anatomy_item_id )

table.name: ANATOMY_REL
table.remarks: Relationships between tissues other than those related to development

column.name: OBJECT_ID
column.remarks: id of the object in the subject (tissue) verb (tissue_relationship) object(tissue) relationship. E.g. tissue B is the object in tissue A is a part of tissue B

column.name: SUBJECT_ID
column.remarks: id of the subject in the subject (tissue) verb (tissue_relationship) object(tissue) relationship. E.g. tissue A is the subject in tissue A is a part of tissue B

column.name: TYPE_ID
column.remarks: id representing the type of relationship in tissue_relationship

table.name: ANATOMY_REL_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_REL_incl_del_v (ANATOMY_REL_ID, OBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_ID, TYPE_ID, ORGANISM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANATOMY_REL_ID, t.OBJECT_ID, t.SUBJECT_ID, t.TYPE_ID, t.ORGANISM_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_REL t UNION SELECT a.ANATOMY_REL_ID, a.OBJECT_ID, a.SUBJECT_ID, a.TYPE_ID, a.ORGANISM_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANATOMY_REL a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANATOMY_REL_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_REL_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANATOMY_REL_ID, OBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_ID, TYPE_ID, ORGANISM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_REL_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANATOMY_REL_TYPE
table.remarks: Stores tissue relationship type

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: English name for displaying to users

column.name: OBO_NAME
column.remarks: Exact OBO relationship name

table.name: ANATOMY_SC_UMI_AGGLST_HEAD_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view anatomy_sc_umi_agglst_head_v as with show_tissue as ( select lstv.xao_rank, lstv.reccount, lstv.anatomyitem, lstv.xao_dbxref_id, lstv.anatomy_item_id from limit_show_tissue_v lstv ), full_list as ( select distinct t2.xao_rank , 0 reccount , t2.anatomyitem , t2.xao_dbxref_id from show_tissue t2 ) select LISTAGG(t1.anatomyitem,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.xao_rank) header_counts from full_list t1

table.name: ANATOMY_SC_UMI_AGGLST_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view anatomy_sc_umi_agglst_v as with show_tissue as ( select lstv.xao_rank, lstv.reccount, lstv.anatomyitem, lstv.xao_dbxref_id, lstv.anatomy_item_id from limit_show_tissue_v lstv ), m1 as ( select distinct sci.isogroup_id ,f1.feature_id gene_id, f1.name gene_symbol --, f1.organism_id orig_organism_id , gmt.gene_id umbrella_gene_id, gmt.symbol umbrella_gene_symbol, gmt.organism_id from feature f1 , genes_mqt gmt , feature_relationship fr , db2inst1.SC_ISOGROUP_TPM_DIM sci where 1=1 and sci.xb_gene_id = f1.feature_id and fr.type_id = 500 --1522 AND fr.subject_id = f1.feature_id and fr.object_id = gmt.gene_id and gmt.organism_id = 11 --and gmt.symbol like 'p%' --where t1.gene_id = 486801--943452 ), full_list as ( select distinct t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , t2.xao_rank --, t2.reccount ,nvl(( select avg(val_tpm) -- count(*) -- sum(tot_val_umi) -- count(*) from sc_data_fact t10 , db2inst1.SC_REFGROUP_TPM_DIM scr , db2inst1.SC_REFGROUP_XAO_DIM scx , db2inst1.xao_gp_stage t20 where 1=1 and t10.refgroup_id = scr.refgroup_id and scx.refgroup = scr.refgroup -- get from the child xao dbxref to the parent xao dbxref and t20.term2_dbxref_id = t2.xao_dbxref_id and scx.anatomy_dbxref_id = t20.term1_dbxref_id and t10.isogroup_id = t1.isogroup_id ),0) reccount
, t2.anatomyitem , t2.xao_dbxref_id from show_tissue t2, m1 t1 ) -- select t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , LISTAGG(t1.anatomyitem,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.xao_rank) header_counts , LISTAGG(t1.reccount,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.xao_rank) detail_counts --,count(*) reccount from full_list t1 group by t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id --order by t1.gene_id, t1.stage_rank

table.name: ANATOMY_STAGE_REL
table.remarks: Relationships between stages

table.name: ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_incl_del_v (ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_ID, OBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_ID, TYPE_ID, ORGANISM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_ID, t.OBJECT_ID, t.SUBJECT_ID, t.TYPE_ID, t.ORGANISM_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL t UNION SELECT a.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_ID, a.OBJECT_ID, a.SUBJECT_ID, a.TYPE_ID, a.ORGANISM_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANATOMY_STAGE_REL a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_ID, OBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_ID, TYPE_ID, ORGANISM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_STAGE_REL_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANATOMY_SUPERTYPES_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW anatomy_supertypes_v AS WITH supertypes (root, rootId, base, baseId, anatomyItem, anatomyItemId, subtype, subtypeId) AS ( select a0.name as aRoot, a0.anatomy_item_id as aRootId, a1.name as base, a1.anatomy_item_id as baseId, a1.name, a1.anatomy_item_id, a0.name as subtype, a0.anatomy_item_id as subtypeId from anatomy_item a0, anatomy_rel ar0, anatomy_item a1 WHERE a0.anatomy_item_id = ar0.subject_id AND ar0.type_id=1 AND ar0.object_id=a1.anatomy_item_id UNION ALL select s.root, s.rootId, s.base, s.baseId, a.name, a.anatomy_item_id, s.anatomyItem as subtype, s.anatomyItemId as subtypeId from supertypes s, anatomy_rel r, anatomy_item a where r.object_id = a.anatomy_item_id and r.type_id = 1 and r.subject_id = s.anatomyItemId ) select * from supertypes

table.name: ANATOMY_SYNONYM
table.remarks: scope of synonyms (e.g. broad, narrow)

column.name: STAGE_ID
column.remarks: stage synonym is attached to , null if synonym attached to stage

column.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: tissue synonym is attached to, null if synonym is not attached to a anatomy item

column.name: TYPE
column.remarks: describes synonym type (e.g. plural)

column.name: SCOPE
column.remarks: describes synonym scope (e.g. )

table.name: ANATOMY_SYNONYM_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_SYNONYM_incl_del_v (NAME, SYNONYM_ID, STAGE_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, TYPE, SCOPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.NAME, t.SYNONYM_ID, t.STAGE_ID, t.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, t.TYPE, t.SCOPE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_SYNONYM t UNION SELECT a.NAME, a.SYNONYM_ID, a.STAGE_ID, a.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, a.TYPE, a.SCOPE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ANATOMY_SYNONYM a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ANATOMY_SYNONYM_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ANATOMY_SYNONYM_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (NAME, SYNONYM_ID, STAGE_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, TYPE, SCOPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ANATOMY_SYNONYM_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ANNOTATION_STATUS
table.remarks: Stores allowablle Annotation Statuses

column.name: SELECTABLE
column.remarks: indicates if this is a user selectable status

table.name: ANTIBODY_IMAGES_V
table.viewSql: create view antibody_images_v as ( select f.feature_id as antibody_id, f.name as antibody_name, i.image_id, ss.start_stage_id, ss.end_stage_id, s1.rank as start_stage_rank, s2.rank as end_stage_rank, es.name as experimentsource, CASE WHEN ( ( s1.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s1.stage_number WHEN ( s1.name = s2.name ) THEN s1.name WHEN ( s1.name != s2.name ) THEN s1.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS stage_text from image i, biomedia b, biomedia_specimenstages bs, specimen_stages ss, stage s1, stage s2, expression_stages_tested est, expressiontest et, experiment e, experimentsource es, feature f where et.feature_id=f.feature_id AND f.type_id=62 AND est.expressiontest_id=et.expressiontest_id AND ss.specimenstages_id=est.specimenstages_id AND s1.stage_id=ss.start_stage_id AND s2.stage_id=ss.end_stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id=ss.specimenstages_id AND b.biomedia_id=bs.biomedia_id AND i.image_id=b.image_id AND e.experiment_id=b.experiment_id AND es.experimentsource_id=e.experimentsource_id )

table.name: ASSERTION
table.remarks: actual assertions ubt tge database

table.name: ASSERTION_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_incl_del_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, ASSERTION_ID, ROW_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, t.ASSERTION_ID, t.ROW_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION t UNION SELECT a.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, a.ASSERTION_ID, a.ROW_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ASSERTION a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ASSERTION_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, ASSERTION_ID, ROW_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE
table.remarks: This is a list of types of assertions made in Xenbase for which evidence may be required.

column.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_ID
column.remarks: id for assertion ype

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: name of the assertion

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.remarks: table name of the table where the assertions is stored

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: description of the assertion

column.name: UI_DESC
column.remarks: The description of the assertion as it will appear in the user interface. This will be in the form of text with placeholders (XML?)

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS
table.remarks: stores columns participating in an assertion_type, if the assertion is related to specific columns in the table record as opposed to the record itself.

column.name: COL_NAME
column.remarks: name of specific column that an assertion type pertains to.

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS_incl_del_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, COL_NAME, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, t.COL_NAME, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS t UNION SELECT a.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, a.COL_NAME, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, COL_NAME, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_COLUMNS_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_incl_del_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, NAME, TAB_NAME, DESCRIPTION, UI_DESC, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, t.NAME, t.TAB_NAME, t.DESCRIPTION, t.UI_DESC, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE t UNION SELECT a.ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, a.NAME, a.TAB_NAME, a.DESCRIPTION, a.UI_DESC, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ASSERTION_TYPE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ASSERTION_TYPE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ASSERTION_TYPE_ID, NAME, TAB_NAME, DESCRIPTION, UI_DESC, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ASSERTION_TYPE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ATTCOLUMN
table.remarks: A column in

column.remarks: name of the table the column belongs to

column.name: COL_NAME
column.remarks: Name of the column

table.name: ATTCOLUMN_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTCOLUMN_incl_del_v (TAB_NAME, COL_NAME, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.TAB_NAME, t.COL_NAME, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ATTCOLUMN t UNION SELECT a.TAB_NAME, a.COL_NAME, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ATTCOLUMN a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ATTCOLUMN_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTCOLUMN_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (TAB_NAME, COL_NAME, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ATTCOLUMN_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ATTOBJECT
table.remarks: An object in the database that may require attribution

column.name: ABBREV
column.remarks: Abbreviation used in Xenbase accesion number

column.name: ALT_DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: Description of object used in lists if different from tab_name

table.name: ATTOBJECT_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTOBJECT_incl_del_v (TAB_NAME, ABBREV, ALT_DESCRIPTION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.TAB_NAME, t.ABBREV, t.ALT_DESCRIPTION, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.RANK, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ATTOBJECT t UNION SELECT a.TAB_NAME, a.ABBREV, a.ALT_DESCRIPTION, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ATTOBJECT a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ATTOBJECT_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTOBJECT_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (TAB_NAME, ABBREV, ALT_DESCRIPTION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ATTOBJECT_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ATTRIB_ARTICLE_RECON_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.attrib_article_recon_v as with m1 as ( SELECT upper(cvt.name) DESCRIPTION , cvt.cvterm_id ,d.db_id , d.dbxref_id dbxref_id , d.accession , A.SOURCE_ROW_ID paper_id --, a.* FROM DBXREF D, ATTRIBUTION A, CVTERM CVT WHERE 1=1 --AND D.DB_ID = 48 --omim --AND D.DB_ID = 754 -- doid --AND D.DB_ID = 512 -- GO AND D.DB_ID in (48,754,512) AND D.DBXREF_ID = A.OBJECT_ROW_ID AND A.OBJECT_NAME = 'DBXREF' AND A.SOURCE_NAME = 'PAPER' -- AND A.SOURCE_ROW_ID = paper_id AND cvt.dbxref_id = d.dbxref_id ORDER BY --d.db_id, a.source_row_id D.ACCESSION ), m2 as ( select accession, cvterm_id, dbxref_id, db_id, DESCRIPTION , listagg(paper_id,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ACCESSION) article_list , count(paper_id ) article_count from m1 group by accession, cvterm_id, dbxref_id, db_id, DESCRIPTION ) select * from m2 where 1=1 --and db_id = 754 -- doid --order by article_count desc

table.name: ATTRIB_ARTICLE_REF
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for count of article annotations to DOID, OMIM and GO

table.name: ATTRIB_ARTICLE_REF_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for count of article annotations to DOID, OMIM and GO

table.name: ATTRIB_ARTICLE_REF_STG
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for count of article annotations to DOID, OMIM and GO

table.name: ATTRIB_DO_ARTICLE_LIST_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for article list with DOID annotations

table.name: ATTRIBUTION
table.remarks: The attribution connects a row, and somtimes column in the table being attributed to the source.

column.name: ATTRIBUTION_ID
column.remarks: unique identifier of an attribution

column.name: OBJECT_NAME
column.remarks: The name of to table containing the object being attributed

column.name: OBJECT_ROW_ID
column.remarks: the primary key id of the record in the object table being attributed

column.name: SOURCE_NAME
column.remarks: The name of the attributionn source table

column.name: OBJ_COL_NAME
column.remarks: If attribution is to a specific colum the name of the column.

column.name: SOURCE_ROW_ID
column.remarks: primary key id of the source table to the item being attributed

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.remarks: The source type

column.name: ATTRIBUTION_TYPE
column.remarks: attirbution tyoe

column.name: COMMENT
column.remarks: a comment about the attribition

column.name: RANK
column.remarks: a value between 1 and 10 constrainting the rank of the attribution

table.name: ATTRIBUTION_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTRIBUTION_incl_del_v (ATTRIBUTION_ID, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_ROW_ID, SOURCE_NAME, OBJ_COL_NAME, SOURCE_ROW_ID, SOURCE_TYPE, ATTRIBUTION_TYPE, COMMENT, RANK, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.ATTRIBUTION_ID, t.OBJECT_NAME, t.OBJECT_ROW_ID, t.SOURCE_NAME, t.OBJ_COL_NAME, t.SOURCE_ROW_ID, t.SOURCE_TYPE, t.ATTRIBUTION_TYPE, t.COMMENT, t.RANK, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ATTRIBUTION t UNION SELECT a.ATTRIBUTION_ID, a.OBJECT_NAME, a.OBJECT_ROW_ID, a.SOURCE_NAME, a.OBJ_COL_NAME, a.SOURCE_ROW_ID, a.SOURCE_TYPE, a.ATTRIBUTION_TYPE, a.COMMENT, a.RANK, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ATTRIBUTION a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ATTRIBUTION_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTRIBUTION_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (ATTRIBUTION_ID, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_ROW_ID, SOURCE_NAME, OBJ_COL_NAME, SOURCE_ROW_ID, SOURCE_TYPE, ATTRIBUTION_TYPE, COMMENT, RANK, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ATTRIBUTION_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ATTRIBUTION_TYPE
table.remarks: Type of attribution

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: description of the attribution type

table.name: ATTRIBUTION_TYPE_AND_SOURCE
table.remarks: This table is use to providing phrasing for attirbution relationships and restrict the compinatin of source and attirbution type

table.name: ATTSOURCE
table.remarks: A object in the database that can be the source of attibution. This can be the actual producer or medium such as a publication where the attibution is reflected

column.name: ABBREV
column.remarks: an abbreviation for the source. This is used in the Xenbase accession number

column.name: ALT_DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: Alternative descrption if not table name is not used

table.name: ATTSOURCE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTSOURCE_incl_del_v (TAB_NAME, ABBREV, ALT_DESCRIPTION, SOURCE_TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.TAB_NAME, t.ABBREV, t.ALT_DESCRIPTION, t.SOURCE_TYPE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.RANK, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.ATTSOURCE t UNION SELECT a.TAB_NAME, a.ABBREV, a.ALT_DESCRIPTION, a.SOURCE_TYPE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_ATTSOURCE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: ATTSOURCE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.ATTSOURCE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (TAB_NAME, ABBREV, ALT_DESCRIPTION, SOURCE_TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.ATTSOURCE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: ATTSOURCE_TYPE
table.remarks: The type of source ie. medium or producer

table.name: AUTHORMAP_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.AUTHORMAP_incl_del_v (AUTHORMAP_ID, FORENAME, INITIALS, LASTNAME, MATCHSTATUS_ID, PERSON_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.AUTHORMAP_ID, t.FORENAME, t.INITIALS, t.LASTNAME, t.MATCHSTATUS_ID, t.PERSON_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.AUTHORMAP t UNION SELECT a.AUTHORMAP_ID, a.FORENAME, a.INITIALS, a.LASTNAME, a.MATCHSTATUS_ID, a.PERSON_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_AUTHORMAP a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: AUTHORMAP_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.AUTHORMAP_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (AUTHORMAP_ID, FORENAME, INITIALS, LASTNAME, MATCHSTATUS_ID, PERSON_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.AUTHORMAP_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BEST_PERSON_AUTHOR_MATCHES_V
table.remarks: This table returns the best person matches to an author id. First, it returns matches that have been confirmed. Second, it returns person_ids that have been matched using the strictest matcing protocol.
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW best_person_author_matches_v AS (SELECT * FROM person_author_match_v pam1 WHERE pam1.confirmation_status = 'C' OR ( pam1.confirmation_status IS NULL AND pam1.rank= (SELECT MAX(pam2.rank) FROM person_author_match_v pam2 WHERE pam2.paperauthor_id = pam1.paperauthor_id GROUP BY pam2.paperauthor_id ) AND not exists (SELECT person_id FROM person_author_match_v pera1 WHERE pera1.person_id <> pam1.person_id AND pera1.paperauthor_id = pam1.personauthor_id AND pera1.confirmation_status = 'C')))

table.name: BIOMEDIA
table.remarks: Has the spcimen in the docuement been treated for its view.

column.name: MOVIE_ID
column.remarks: if the BioMedia is a move the id of the move record

column.name: MODEL_ID
column.remarks: if the biomedia is a model the id of the model record

column.name: EXPERIMENT_ID
column.remarks: if the image was created as part of an experiment the images were a part of

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person in Xenbase that created record

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: creation time

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: id of person in xenbase to last modify the record, null if never modified at

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

column.name: IMAGE_ID
column.remarks: if the biomedia is an image the image that it is a part of

checkConstraint.constraint: (IMAGE_ID IS NOT NULL AND MOVIE_ID IS NULL AND MODEL_ID IS NULL) OR (IMAGE_ID IS NULL AND MOVIE_ID IS NOT NULL AND MODEL_ID IS NULL) OR (IMAGE_ID IS NULL AND MOVIE_ID IS NULL AND MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL)
checkConstraint.name: BM_CHECK_MEDIA

table.name: BIOMEDIA_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA_incl_del_v (BIOMEDIA_ID, MOVIE_ID, MODEL_ID, EXPERIMENT_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, IMAGE_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.BIOMEDIA_ID, t.MOVIE_ID, t.MODEL_ID, t.EXPERIMENT_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.IMAGE_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA t UNION SELECT a.BIOMEDIA_ID, a.MOVIE_ID, a.MODEL_ID, a.EXPERIMENT_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.IMAGE_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_BIOMEDIA a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: BIOMEDIA_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (BIOMEDIA_ID, MOVIE_ID, MODEL_ID, EXPERIMENT_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, IMAGE_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES

table.name: BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_incl_del_v (BIOMEDIA_ID, BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, SHOWS_EXPRESSION, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.BIOMEDIA_ID, t.BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, t.SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, t.SHOWS_EXPRESSION, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES t UNION SELECT a.BIOMEDIA_ID, a.BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, a.SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, a.SHOWS_EXPRESSION, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

table.name: BIOMEDIASPECIMENSTAGES_VIEW_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BIOMEDIASPECIMENSTAGES_VIEW_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (BIOMEDIASPECIMENSTAGES_VIEW_ID, STANDARDSPECIMENVIEW_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, BIOMEDIA_SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, DESCRIPTION, CLEARED, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.BIOMEDIASPECIMENSTAGES_VIEW_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BOOK_AUTHOR_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BOOK_AUTHOR_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (BOOKAUTHOR_ID, LASTNAME, MIDDLE_INITIALS, FIRSTNAME, RANK, BOOK_ID, PERSON_ID, BOOKPERSONRELTYPE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.BOOK_AUTHOR_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BOOK_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BOOK_incl_del_v (BOOK_ID, VOLUME, EDITION, TITLE, ISBN, PUBLICATION_PLACE, PUBLICATION_DATE, URL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, BOOKTYPE_ID, PUBLISHER_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.BOOK_ID, t.VOLUME, t.EDITION, t.TITLE, t.ISBN, t.PUBLICATION_PLACE, t.PUBLICATION_DATE, t.URL, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.BOOKTYPE_ID, t.PUBLISHER_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.BOOK t UNION SELECT a.BOOK_ID, a.VOLUME, a.EDITION, a.TITLE, a.ISBN, a.PUBLICATION_PLACE, a.PUBLICATION_DATE, a.URL, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.BOOKTYPE_ID, a.PUBLISHER_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_BOOK a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: BOOK_PERSON_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BOOK_PERSON_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (PERSON_ID, BOOK_ID, BOOKPERSONRELTYPE_ID, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.BOOK_PERSON_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BOOK_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.BOOK_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (BOOK_ID, VOLUME, EDITION, TITLE, ISBN, PUBLICATION_PLACE, PUBLICATION_DATE, URL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, BOOKTYPE_ID, PUBLISHER_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.BOOK_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: BOOKPERSONRELTYPE
table.remarks: Describes relationship between the person and book. E.g., author or editor.

table.name: BOOKTYPE
table.remarks: Describes aspects of a book such as whether it is an authored text or a edited collection

table.name: CAT_GENE_SYMBOL_ORTHO_SYNONYMS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_GENE_SYMBOL_ORTHO_SYNONYMS_V" ("FEATURE_ID", "SYMBOL", "ORTHOLOG_ID", "ORGANISM_ID") AS SELECT x.feature_id, s.name symbol, f.feature_id ortholog_id, f.organism_id FROM CAT_X_Gene_Feature_v x, feature_relationship fr, cvterm c, feature f, feature_synonym fs, synonym s WHERE x.feature_id = fr.object_id and fr.type_id = c.cvterm_id and c.name = 'orthologous_to' and fr.subject_id = f.feature_id and f.feature_id= fs.feature_id and fs.synonym_id = s.synonym_id

table.name: CAT_GENE_SYMBOL_SYNONYMS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_GENE_SYMBOL_SYNONYMS_V" ("FEATURE_ID", "SYMBOL") AS SELECT x.feature_id, s.name symbol FROM CAT_X_Gene_Feature_v x, feature_synonym fs, synonym s WHERE x.feature_id = fs.feature_id and fs.synonym_id = s.synonym_id

table.name: CAT_X_GENE_DB_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_X_GENE_DB_V" ("FEATURE_ID", "ACCESSION") AS select f2.feature_id, d.accession from feature f1, feature f2, dbxref d, feature_dbxref fd, feature_relationship fr, cvterm c1, cvterm c2, cvterm c3 where fd.feature_id=f1.feature_id and fd.dbxref_id=d.dbxref_id and f1.type_id=c1.cvterm_id and c1.name='gene' and f1.organism_id in(12,13) and fr.subject_id=f1.feature_id and fr.object_id=f2.feature_id and fr.type_id=c2.cvterm_id and c2.name='is_a' and f2.organism_id=11 and f2.type_id=c3.cvterm_id and c3.name='gene'

table.name: CAT_X_GENE_FEATURE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_X_GENE_FEATURE_V" ("FEATURE_ID", "DBXREF_ID", "ORGANISM_ID", "NAME", "UNIQUENAME", "RESIDUES", "SEQLEN", "MD5CHECKSUM", "TYPE_ID", "IS_ANALYSIS", "IS_OBSOLETE", "TIMEACCESSIONED", "TIMELASTMODIFIED", "CREATED_BY", "CREATED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "FULL_NAME", "DESCRIPTION", "SORTABLE_NAME") AS SELECT f.* from feature f, cvterm c WHERE organism_id = 11 AND f.type_id = c.cvterm_id AND c.name = 'gene'

table.name: CAT_X_GENE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_X_GENE_V" ("FEATURE_ID", "DBXREF_ID", "ORGANISM_ID", "NAME", "UNIQUENAME", "RESIDUES", "SEQLEN", "MD5CHECKSUM", "TYPE_ID", "IS_ANALYSIS", "IS_OBSOLETE", "TIMEACCESSIONED", "TIMELASTMODIFIED", "CREATED_BY", "CREATED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "FULL_NAME", "DESCRIPTION", "SORTABLE_NAME", "LONGNAME") AS SELECT x.*, x.full_name as longname FROM CAT_X_Gene_Feature_v x

table.name: CAT_X_SPECIES_GENE_FEATURE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."CAT_X_SPECIES_GENE_FEATURE_V" ("XFEATURE_ID", "FEATURE_ID", "DBXREF_ID", "ORGANISM_ID", "NAME", "UNIQUENAME", "RESIDUES", "SEQLEN", "MD5CHECKSUM", "TYPE_ID", "IS_ANALYSIS", "IS_OBSOLETE", "TIMEACCESSIONED", "TIMELASTMODIFIED", "CREATED_BY", "CREATED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "FULL_NAME", "DESCRIPTION", "SORTABLE_NAME") AS Select x.feature_id as xfeature_id, f.* FROM CAT_X_Gene_Feature_v x, feature_relationship fr, cvterm c1, feature f, cvterm c2 WHERE x.feature_id = fr.object_id and fr.type_id = c1.cvterm_id and c1.name = 'is_a' and fr.subject_id = f.feature_id and f.type_id = c2.cvterm_id and c2.name = 'gene' and f.organism_id =13

table.name: CDNA_PROBE_V
table.viewSql: Create View db2inst1.cdna_probe_v AS SELECT * FROM feature WHERE type_id = 553

table.name: CDNA_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.cDNA_v AS (SELECT * FROM feature WHERE type_id = 822)

table.name: CLONE_CHANGE_AGE_RPT_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view clone_change_age_rpt_v as with m1 as ( select days(current timestamp) - days(coalesce(modified_at,created_at)) aged_from_change , date(coalesce(modified_at,created_at)) add_amend_date , cmt.clone_id , 'XB-CLONE-' || cmt.clone_id xb_clone , cmt.name , cmt.organism_id , cmt.description from clones_mqt cmt where cmt.created_by in ( 1290, 1907 ) or cmt.modified_by in ( 1290, 1907 ) --or description like 'EXRC%' --order by created_at desc --order by coalesce(modified_at,created_at) desc ) select * from m1 --where aged_from_change < 300 --order by aged_from_change, clone_id

table.name: CLONE_IMAGES_V
table.viewSql: create view clone_images_v as ( select pc.cdna_id, pc.cdna_name, i.image_id, ss.start_stage_id, ss.end_stage_id, s1.rank as start_stage_rank, s2.rank as end_stage_rank, es.name as experimentsource, CASE WHEN ( ( s1.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s1.stage_number WHEN ( s1.name = s2.name ) THEN s1.name WHEN ( s1.name != s2.name ) THEN s1.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS stage_text from image i, biomedia b, biomedia_specimenstages bs, specimen_stages ss, stage s1, stage s2, expression_stages_tested est, expressiontest et, probe_cdnas_v pc, experiment e, experimentsource es where et.feature_id=pc.probe_id AND est.expressiontest_id=et.expressiontest_id AND ss.specimenstages_id=est.specimenstages_id AND s1.stage_id=ss.start_stage_id AND s2.stage_id=ss.end_stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id=ss.specimenstages_id AND b.biomedia_id=bs.biomedia_id AND i.image_id=b.image_id AND e.experiment_id=b.experiment_id AND es.experimentsource_id=e.experimentsource_id )

table.name: CLONES_MQT
table.remarks: This is an artificial MQT for clone features

table.name: COCITED_ANATOMY_GENES_V
table.viewSql: create view cocited_anatomy_genes_v AS WITH anatomy_item_papers AS (SELECT a1.object_row_id AS anatomy_item_id, a1.source_row_id AS paper_id FROM attribution a1 WHERE a1.object_name = 'ANATOMY_ITEM' AND a1.source_name = 'PAPER' AND a1.source_type = 'medium'), cocited_features AS (SELECT f.feature_id AS feature_id, f.name, a2.source_row_id AS paper_id FROM feature f, attribution a2 WHERE f.feature_id = a2.object_row_id AND a2.object_name = 'FEATURE' AND a2.source_name = 'PAPER' AND a2.source_type = 'medium'), results AS (SELECT g.anatomy_item_id, c.feature_id AS umbrella_gene_id, c.name AS umbrella_gene_symbol, g.paper_id FROM anatomy_item_papers g, cocited_features c WHERE g.paper_id = c.paper_id ) SELECT * FROM results

table.name: COCITED_FEATURES_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.cocited_features_v AS WITH feature_papers AS (SELECT a1.object_row_id as feature_id, a1.source_row_id AS paper_id FROM attribution a1 WHERE a1.object_name ='FEATURE' AND a1.source_name ='PAPER' AND a1.source_type = 'medium' ), cocited_features AS (SELECT f.feature_id as feature_id, f.name, a2.source_row_id as paper_id FROM feature f, attribution a2 WHERE f.feature_id = a2.object_row_id AND a2.object_name ='FEATURE' AND a2.source_name ='PAPER' AND a2.source_type ='medium' ), results as (select g.feature_id, c.feature_id as cocited_feature_id, c.name as cocited_name, count(*) as occurrences from feature_papers g, cocited_features c where g.paper_id = c.paper_id and g.feature_id != c.feature_id group by g.feature_id, c.feature_id, c.name) SELECT r.* FROM results r

table.name: COCITED_STAGE_GENES_V
table.viewSql: create view cocited_stage_genes_v AS WITH stage_papers AS (SELECT a1.object_row_id AS stage_id, a1.source_row_id AS paper_id FROM attribution a1 WHERE a1.object_name = 'STAGE' AND a1.source_name = 'PAPER' AND a1.source_type = 'medium'), cocited_features AS (SELECT f.feature_id AS feature_id, f.name, a2.source_row_id AS paper_id FROM feature f, attribution a2 WHERE f.feature_id = a2.object_row_id AND a2.object_name = 'FEATURE' AND a2.source_name = 'PAPER' AND a2.source_type = 'medium'), results AS (SELECT g.stage_id, c.feature_id AS cocited_feature_id, c.name AS cocited_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM stage_papers g, cocited_features c WHERE g.paper_id = c.paper_id GROUP BY g.stage_id, c.feature_id, c.name) SELECT r.* FROM results r

table.name: CORAL_ATTRIB_DIM
table.remarks: reference group params for moon phase, hour and temperature

table.name: CORAL_ATTRIB_DIM_OLD
table.remarks: reference group params for moon phase, hour and temperature

table.name: CORAL_AX_1_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view coral_ax_1_v as select t1.isogroup_id, t3.isogroup, t2.refgroup, t2.individual, t3.symbol, t2.temperature, t2.phase , t2.phase_num , t2.hour_num --, '2017-01-0' ||t2.phase_num||' ' || t2.hour_num ||':00:00' calcdate , case when t2.hour_num = 24 then '2017-01-0' ||t2.phase_num||' ' || '23' ||':59:59' else '2017-01-0' ||t2.phase_num||' ' || t2.hour_num ||':00:00' end calcdate ,case when (t2.hour_num >= 8 and t2.hour_num <= 16) then 'DAY' else 'NIGHT' end daynight
-- calc log2 value ,case when t1.measure > 0 then ln(t1.measure)/ln(2) else 0 end log2measure
, t1.measure --, calcdelta , (select max(temperature_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id ) temperature_flag , (select max(phase_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id ) phase_flag , (select max(hour_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id ) hour_flag -- flag bitmap --, (select 6 from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 0 and hour_flag = 1 ) temp_hour -- temp hour --, (select 8 from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 0 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 ) phase_hour -- phase hour --, (select 4 from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 0 ) temp_phase -- temp phase --, (select 9 from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 ) temp_phase_hour -- temp phase hour
from db2inst1.Coral_Fact t1 , db2inst1.Coral_Attrib_Dim t2 , db2inst1.Coral_Norm_Counts_Grid t3 where t2.refgroup_id = t1.refgroup_id and t3.isogroup_id = t1.isogroup_id and t3.symbol is not null

table.name: CORAL_AX_2_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view coral_ax_2_v as select t1.isogroup_id, t3.isogroup, t2.refgroup, t2.individual, t3.symbol, t2.temperature, t2.phase , t2.phase_num , t2.hour_num --, '2017-01-0' ||t2.phase_num||' ' || t2.hour_num ||':00:00' calcdate , t1.measure --, calcdelta , (select max(temperature_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id) temperature_flag , (select max(phase_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id) phase_flag , (select max(hour_flag) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id) hour_flag -- , (select count(*) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 0 and hour_flag = 1 ) temp_hour -- temp hour , (select count(*) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 0 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 ) phase_hour -- phase hour , (select count(*) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 0 ) temp_phase -- temp phase , (select count(*) from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 ) temp_phase_hour -- temp phase hour from db2inst1.Coral_Fact t1 , db2inst1.Coral_Attrib_Dim t2 , db2inst1.Coral_Norm_Counts_Grid t3 where t2.refgroup_id = t1.refgroup_id and t3.isogroup_id = t1.isogroup_id and t3.symbol is not null -- test for significant isgroup's based on annotated observations and exists ( select 'found' from db2inst1.Coral_Primary_Dim t3 where t1.isogroup_id = t3.isogroup_id --and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 0 and hour_flag = 1 -- temp hour --and temperature_flag = 0 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 -- phase hour --and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 0 -- temp phase --and temperature_flag = 1 and phase_flag = 1 and hour_flag = 1 -- temp phase hour ) ----and t1.isogroup_id = 518 --and t3.isogroup_num = 488

table.name: COUNTRY_SYNONYM
table.remarks: This table contains alternate names for countries (i.e. United States vs USA. This is for use with different data loaders

table.name: CUR_EXP_ASSAY
table.remarks: Group of Conditions for Assay for an Experiment

table.name: CUR_EXP_CO_PROP
table.remarks: Logical association of EM and Assay for an Experiment

column.name: CURXPA_ID
column.remarks: Logical group of Assay members related to an experiment

column.name: CURXPX_ID
column.remarks: Logical group of EM members related to an experiment

column.name: EXPERIMENT_ID
column.remarks: Conceptual experiment composed of EM and the Assay(s)

column.name: IS_FOR_BIGWIG
column.remarks: Flag for de-selection of tracks not needed in jbrowse

table.name: CUR_EXP_CONDITION
table.remarks: Assay tissue and stage give the Conditions

column.name: CURXPA_ID
column.remarks: Logical group of Assay members related to an experiment

column.name: RANK
column.remarks: Logical order of group members of the Assay(s) performed

column.name: START_STG_NAME
column.remarks: ref to stage FK: NF stage 35 and 36

column.name: START_STG_DBXREF_ID
column.remarks: ref to stage dbxref_id: XAO:1000049

column.name: START_STG_ACCESSION
column.remarks: ref to stage accession: XAO:1000049

column.name: END_STG_NAME
column.remarks: ref to stage FK

column.name: END_STG_DBXREF_ID
column.remarks: ref to stage dbxref_id

column.name: END_STG_ACCESSION
column.remarks: ref to stage accession

column.name: CONTRIBAUTHOR_ID
column.remarks: Xenbase Id for this table

column.name: RANK
column.remarks: order in the contributors list for the parent paper

column.name: FORENAME
column.remarks: Author first name.

column.name: INITIALS
column.remarks: First name and any other name initials.

column.name: LASTNAME
column.remarks: Author's last name.

column.name: SUFFIX
column.remarks: Suffix such as 1st, 2nd, Third

column.name: IS_NAME_VALID
column.remarks: Indicates if the pubmed database considers this name valid.

column.name: IS_NOT
column.remarks: This indicates that this record is not a match with the specified author or organization despite of other evidence to the contrary. This should only be set to true in the article was manually unassigned from a person by the person or an adminstrator.

column.name: COLLECTIVE_NAME
column.remarks: name of an organizational author.

checkConstraint.constraint: NOT ((COLLECTIVE_NAME IS NULL) AND (LASTNAME IS NULL))
checkConstraint.name: CONTRIBAUTHOR_C2

column.name: DISEASE_DB
column.remarks: db_id for DOID or OMIM

column.name: DISEASE_ID
column.remarks: dbxref_id for the disease

table.name: CUR_EXP_EXPERIMENT
table.remarks: holds reference to Article (ie:paper) and Frog_Experiment ( ie:Specimen). reports start and end stage of development. sets the context for phenstatement.

column.name: PHENO_AMBIGUOUS_FLAG
column.remarks: when ambiguous phenotype 1 else 0 for clean gene to phenotype

table.name: CUR_EXP_GENE_HIER_MQT
table.remarks: This is an artificial MQT for gene and their graph path or hierarchy

table.name: CUR_EXP_GEO_JBRUN_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_jbrun_v as select m1.CO_PROP_ID||'v' || row_number() over ( partition by m1.CO_PROP_ID order by m2.cat_hierarchy_id ) label_old , m2.cat_hierarchy_id label --, DBMS_UTILITY.GET_HASH_VALUE(m1.CO_PROP_ID||coalesce(m2.cat_hierarchy,'none'),10,9024) AS "LABEL_HASH" --,m1.EXP_INIT_GSM_ID||'_'||m1.CO_PROP_ID||'.bw' bigwig --, m1.EXP_INIT_GSM_ID ||'_'||m1.CO_PROP_ID||'.bw' bigwig --, m1.EXP_INIT_SRR_ID ||'_'||m1.CO_PROP_ID||'.bw' bigwig , m1.EXP_INIT_GSM_ID ||'_'||m1.CO_PROP_ID||'.bw' BIGWIG ,m1.TRACKNAME trackname ,m1.ASSAYTYPE assay ,m1.START_STG_NAME stage ,m1.TISSUE_NAME tissue , m1.PUBLICATION publication , m1.PAPER_ID paper , m1.LAB_NAME lab , m1.GSE_ID gse_id , trim(m1.EXP_GSM_LIST) gsm , m2.cat_hierarchy -- other fields not included in run file , m1.CO_PROP_ID bin_id , m1.CTRL_CO_PROP_ID ctrl_bin_id , m1.LINE_STRAIN strain , m1.IS_FOR_BIGWIG --, ASSAYTYPE || '/' || START_STG_NAME cat_hierarchy --, coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 'XL92' else 'XT91' end ,'XT91') species_version --, coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 128 else 124 end ,124) species_version_dbxref , m1.species_version , m1.ext_species_version , m1.species_version_dbxref , m1.status_list , m1.status_ids --, coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 'xenopus-laevis' else 'xenopus-trop' end ,'xenopus-trop') SPECIES --, 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID gse_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE gse_species_ver_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE ||'/BigWigs' gse_bw_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE ||'/ExpressionFiles' gse_tpm_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE ||'/DE_Analysis' gse_de_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE ||'/Called_Peaks' gse_peak_root_folder , 'ftp.xenbaseturbofrog.org/Genomics/GEO/' || m1.GSE_ID ||'/'|| m1.ext_species_version ||'/'|| m1.ASSAYTYPE ||'/Readme.txt' gse_readme_file from db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_run_v m1 , cur_exp_cat_hierarchy m2 where m1.co_prop_id = m2.co_prop_id (+) --and gse_id = 'GSE93195'

table.name: CUR_EXP_GEO_PIPE_RUN_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_pipe_run_v as select --coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 'XL92' else 'XT91' end ,'XT91') GENOME species_version GENOME -- species_version_dbxref --, coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 128 else 124 end ,124) species_version_dbxref , coalesce(case when instr(LINE_STRAIN,'laevis') >0 then 'xenopus-laevis' else 'xenopus-trop' end ,'xenopus-trop') SPECIES , GSE_ID GSE, trim(EXP_GSM_LIST) TREATMENT, trim(CTRL_GSM_LIST) CONTROL , EXP_INIT_GSM_ID ||'_'||CO_PROP_ID||'.bw' BIGWIG, trim(EXP_SRR_LIST) SRR_TREATMENT , trim(CTRL_SRR_LIST) SRR_CONTROL --, coalesce(case when LIBRARYLAYOUT = 'SINGLE' then 'SINGLE-END' else 'PAIRED-END' end,'SINGLE-END') LIBRARYLAYOUT , LIBRARYLAYOUT --, ASSAYTYPE || coalesce(case when instr(CHIPTYPE,'Epi')>0 then '-Epigenetic' when instr(CHIPTYPE,'Factor')>0 then '-TF' else CHIPTYPE end ,'') ASSAYTYPE , ASSAYTYPE || coalesce('-'||CHIPTYPE,'') ASSAYTYPE --, SRR_ASSAYTYPE , TRACKNAME trackname , 'XB-ART-' ||PAPER_ID xb_art_id , pubmed_id , CO_PROP_ID bin_id , CTRL_CO_PROP_ID ctrl_bin_id , gse_title , status_list , status_ids from db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_run_v where 1=1 --and ASSAYTYPE in ('RNA-Seq','ChIP-Seq') --and SRR_ASSAYTYPE in ('RNA-Seq','ChIP-Seq') --and gse_id = 'GSE93195' --order by gse_id,exp_co_prop_id

table.name: CUR_EXP_GEO_PIPE_SRR_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_pipe_srr_v as select ( select max(gse_id) from cur_exp_gses t2 where t2.sra_study_num = srastudy ) gse_id, row_number() over ( partition by srastudy order by SRA_RUNTBL_ID ) recnum, run_name srr, download_path url_srr_source, samplename gsm, submission sra, experiment srx, librarystrategy assaytype, librarylayout, srastudy srp, bioproject from DB2INST1.CUR_EXP_SRA_RUNTBL --order by gse_id, recnum, srastudy, sra_runtbl_id

table.name: CUR_EXP_GEO_RUN_CNT_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view db2inst1.cur_exp_geo_run_cnt_v as with m1 as ( select t1.co_prop_id, t1.trackname ,t1.curxpa_id ,t1.curxpx_id ,t1.curxprel_id ,t1.is_for_bigwig , t20.gsms_ctrl_id, t20.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id, t20.control_co_prop_id ctrl_co_prop_id --, ( select gsms_ctrl_id from cur_exp_gsms_ctrl t20 where t20.co_prop_id = t1.co_prop_id ) gsms_ctrl_id from cur_exp_co_prop t1 left outer join cur_exp_gsms_ctrl t20 ON t1.co_prop_id = t20.co_prop_id where t1.curxpx_id in ( select t10.curxpx_id from cur_exp_experiment t10, cur_exp_method t11 where t10.curxprel_id = t11.curxprel_id --and t11.gse_id in ( '93195' , '87653' , '75278' , '73430' ) ) and t1.trackname is not null --and t1.co_prop_id in ( 10,11) --order by t1.co_prop_id ), -- exp_list as ( select t2.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id , min('GSM'||t2.gsm_id) lowest_gsm_id , substr(LISTAGG('GSM'||t2.gsm_id,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t2.gsm_id),1,200) exp_gsm_list , count(*) gsm_reccount from cur_exp_gsms t2 where t2.co_prop_id is not null group by t2.co_prop_id ) , srr_group as ( select t20.samplename , t20.srastudy , t20.librarystrategy ,t20.librarylayout ,min(t20.run_name) lowest_srr_id -- problem with field size that cx truncation , cast(LISTAGG(t20.run_name,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t20.run_name) as VARCHAR(8000)) run_name , count(*) sra_reccount from DB2INST1.CUR_EXP_SRA_RUNTBL t20 --where t20.samplename = 'GSM352202' -- 'GSM352204' group by t20.samplename, t20.srastudy , t20.librarystrategy ,t20.librarylayout ) ,
srr_list as ( select distinct t10.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id --t10.gsm_id, , min('GSM'||t10.gsm_id) lowest_gsm_id , min('GSE'||t10.gse_id) gse_num , min(t20.lowest_srr_id) lowest_srr_id , cast(LISTAGG('GSM'||t10.gsm_id,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t10.gsm_id)as VARCHAR(8000)) exp_gsm_list , cast(LISTAGG(t20.run_name,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t20.run_name)as VARCHAR(8000)) exp_srr_list --( select max(gse_id) from cur_exp_gses t2 where t2.sra_study_num = t20.srastudy ) gse_id, --row_number() over ( partition by srastudy order by SRA_RUNTBL_ID ) recnum, --t20.run_name srr --, download_path url_srr_source --, t20.samplename gsm --, submission sra, experiment srx --, t20.librarystrategy assaytype , min(t20.librarystrategy) assaytype , min(t20.librarylayout) librarylayout --, t20.librarylayout , min(t20.srastudy) srp , sum(t20.sra_reccount ) sra_reccount --, t20.srastudy srp --, t20.bioproject from cur_exp_gsms t10 left outer join srr_group t20 --DB2INST1.CUR_EXP_SRA_RUNTBL t20 ON 'GSM'||t10.gsm_id = t20.samplename where t10.co_prop_id is not null group by t10.co_prop_id
) -- results select -- ( select max('GSE' ||gse_id) from cur_exp_gsms m3 where m3.co_prop_id = m1.co_prop_id ) gse_id ( select max('GSE' ||m3.gse_id) from cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id ) gse_id , ( select max(m3.paper_id) from cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id ) paper_id , ( select max(m4.pubmedid) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m3.gse_id = m4.gse_id ) pubmed_id , ( select max(m4.seriestitle) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m3.gse_id = m4.gse_id ) gse_title ,( select pa.citation_name || ' et al. (' || varchar(year(ji.publication_date)) || ')' publication from paper p, journalissue ji, paper_author pa, cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and p.paper_id = m3.paper_id and pa.paper_id = p.paper_id and pa.rank = 0 and p.journalissue_id = ji.journalissue_id ) , ( select max(m5.name) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4, lab m5 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m4.gse_id = m3.gse_id and m4.lab_id = m5.lab_id ) lab_name , ( select max(m5.species) from cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id ) line_strain , ( select max(m5.organism_id) from cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id ) organism_id , ( select max(m6.species_version) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) species_version , ( select max(m6.ext_species_version) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) ext_species_version , ( select max(m6.dbxref_id) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) species_version_dbxref , ( select max(m7.cur_names) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gse_status_list_v m7 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m7.gse_id = m3.gse_id ) status_list , ( select max(m7.cur_status_ids) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gse_status_list_v m7 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m7.gse_id = m3.gse_id ) status_ids ,m1.co_prop_id, m1.trackname, m1.gsms_ctrl_id, m1.exp_co_prop_id, m1.ctrl_co_prop_id ,m1.is_for_bigwig --,m1.curxpa_id --,m1.curxpx_id , (select assaytype_dbxref_id from cur_exp_condition t40 where t40.curxpa_id = m1.curxpa_id ) , (select min(cvt.short_name) tissue_name --min( tissue_name ) tissue_name --coalesce(chiptype,' ') chiptype --, t20.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id, t20.control_co_prop_id ctrl_co_prop_id --, ( select gsms_ctrl_id from cur_exp_gsms_ctrl t20 where t20.co_prop_id = t1.co_prop_id ) gsms_ctrl_id from cur_exp_co_prop t1 left outer join cur_exp_gsms_ctrl t20 ON t1.co_prop_id = t20.co_prop_id where t1.curxpx_id in ( select t10.curxpx_id from cur_exp_experiment t10, cur_exp_method t11 where t10.curxprel_id = t11.curxprel_id --and t11.gse_id in ( '93195' , '87653' , '75278' , '73430' ) ) and t1.trackname is not null --and t1.co_prop_id in ( 10,11) --order by t1.co_prop_id ), -- exp_list as ( select t2.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id , min('GSM'||t2.gsm_id) lowest_gsm_id , substr(LISTAGG('GSM'||t2.gsm_id,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t2.gsm_id),1,200) exp_gsm_list from cur_exp_gsms t2 where t2.co_prop_id is not null group by t2.co_prop_id ) , srr_group as ( select t20.samplename , t20.srastudy , t20.librarystrategy ,t20.librarylayout ,min(t20.run_name) lowest_srr_id -- problem with field size that cx truncation , cast(LISTAGG(t20.run_name,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t20.run_name) as VARCHAR(8000)) run_name , count(*) sra_reccount from DB2INST1.CUR_EXP_SRA_RUNTBL t20 --where t20.samplename = 'GSM352202' -- 'GSM352204' group by t20.samplename, t20.srastudy , t20.librarystrategy ,t20.librarylayout ) , srr_list as ( select distinct t10.co_prop_id exp_co_prop_id --t10.gsm_id, , min('GSM'||t10.gsm_id) lowest_gsm_id , min('GSE'||t10.gse_id) gse_num , min(t20.lowest_srr_id) lowest_srr_id , cast(LISTAGG('GSM'||t10.gsm_id,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t10.gsm_id)as VARCHAR(8000)) exp_gsm_list , cast(LISTAGG(t20.run_name,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t20.run_name)as VARCHAR(8000)) exp_srr_list --( select max(gse_id) from cur_exp_gses t2 where t2.sra_study_num = t20.srastudy ) gse_id, --row_number() over ( partition by srastudy order by SRA_RUNTBL_ID ) recnum, --t20.run_name srr --, download_path url_srr_source --, t20.samplename gsm --, submission sra, experiment srx --, t20.librarystrategy assaytype , min(t20.librarystrategy) assaytype , min(t20.librarylayout) librarylayout --, t20.librarylayout , min(t20.srastudy) srp , max(t20.sra_reccount ) sra_reccount --, t20.srastudy srp --, t20.bioproject from cur_exp_gsms t10 left outer join srr_group t20 --DB2INST1.CUR_EXP_SRA_RUNTBL t20 ON 'GSM'||t10.gsm_id = t20.samplename where t10.co_prop_id is not null group by t10.co_prop_id ) -- results select -- ( select max('GSE' ||gse_id) from cur_exp_gsms m3 where m3.co_prop_id = m1.co_prop_id ) gse_id ( select max('GSE' ||m3.gse_id) from cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id ) gse_id , ( select max(m3.paper_id) from cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id ) paper_id , ( select max(m4.pubmedid) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m3.gse_id = m4.gse_id ) pubmed_id , ( select max(m4.seriestitle) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m3.gse_id = m4.gse_id ) gse_title ,( select pa.citation_name || ' et al. (' || varchar(year(ji.publication_date)) || ')' publication from paper p, journalissue ji, paper_author pa, cur_exp_method m3 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and p.paper_id = m3.paper_id and pa.paper_id = p.paper_id and pa.rank = 0 and p.journalissue_id = ji.journalissue_id ) , ( select max(m5.name) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gses m4, lab m5 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m4.gse_id = m3.gse_id and m4.lab_id = m5.lab_id ) lab_name , ( select max(m5.species) from cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id ) line_strain , ( select max(m5.organism_id) from cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id ) organism_id , ( select max(m6.species_version) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) species_version , ( select max(m6.ext_species_version) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) ext_species_version , ( select max(m6.dbxref_id) from cur_exp_species_version m6, cur_exp_experiment m3, line m4, organism m5 where m3.curxpx_id = m1.curxpx_id and m4.line_id = m3.line_id and m4.taxonomy = m5.organism_id and m6.current_flag = 1 and m6.organism_id = m5.organism_id ) species_version_dbxref , ( select max(m7.cur_names) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gse_status_list_v m7 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m7.gse_id = m3.gse_id ) status_list , ( select max(m7.cur_status_ids) from cur_exp_method m3, cur_exp_gse_status_list_v m7 where m3.curxprel_id = m1.curxprel_id and m7.gse_id = m3.gse_id ) status_ids ,m1.co_prop_id, m1.trackname, m1.gsms_ctrl_id, m1.exp_co_prop_id, m1.ctrl_co_prop_id ,m1.is_for_bigwig --,m1.curxpa_id --,m1.curxpx_id , (select
