table.viewSql: create view gene_images_v as ( select pg.umbrella_gene_id, pg.umbrella_gene_symbol, i.image_id, ss.start_stage_id, ss.end_stage_id, s1.rank as start_stage_rank, s2.rank as end_stage_rank, es.name as experimentsource, CASE WHEN ( ( s1.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s1.stage_number WHEN ( s1.name = s2.name ) THEN s1.name WHEN ( s1.name != s2.name ) THEN s1.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS stage_text from image i, biomedia b, biomedia_specimenstages bs, specimen_stages ss, stage s1, stage s2, expression_stages_tested est, expressiontest et, probe_genes_v pg, experiment e, experimentsource es where et.feature_id=pg.probe_id AND est.expressiontest_id=et.expressiontest_id AND ss.specimenstages_id=est.specimenstages_id AND s1.stage_id=ss.start_stage_id AND s2.stage_id=ss.end_stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id=ss.specimenstages_id AND b.biomedia_id=bs.biomedia_id AND i.image_id=b.image_id AND e.experiment_id=b.experiment_id AND es.experimentsource_id=e.experimentsource_id )

table.name: GENE_MP_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for Gene and associated MP and MONDO terms via MOUSE GENE

table.name: GENE_UMBRELLA_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.gene_umbrella_v as -- get umbrella with m1 as ( select gene_id, organism_id, symbol, full_name from genes_mqt where organism_id in (11,12,13) --and symbol like 'pax8%' ) , gene_umbrella as ( select --m1.*, m1.gene_id, m1.organism_id, m1.symbol, m1.full_name, genepage.feature_id umbrella_gene, genepage.name umbrella_symbol, genepage.organism_id umbrella_organism_id, genepage.full_name umbrella_full_name --'XB-GENEPAGE-' ||genepage.feature_id , fr2.feature_relationship_id , fr2.type_id from m1, feature_relationship fr2, feature genepage where fr2.object_id = genepage.feature_id AND fr2.type_id = 500 AND fr2.subject_id = m1.gene_id AND genepage.type_id = 1214 AND genepage.organism_id = 11 UNION -- add in the umbrella record as itself select --m1.*, m1.gene_id, m1.organism_id, m1.symbol, m1.full_name, m1.gene_id umbrella_gene, m1.symbol umbrella_symbol, m1.organism_id umbrella_organism_id, m1.full_name umbrella_full_name --'XB-GENEPAGE-' ||genepage.feature_id , 0 feature_relationship_id , 0 type_id from m1 where m1.organism_id = 11 ) select gu.*, case when gu.organism_id = 11 then 13 else gu.organism_id end pheno_organism_id, ( select o.species --o.abbreviation from organism o where o.organism_id = ( case when gu.organism_id = 11 then 13 else gu.organism_id end ) ) pheno_organism_name from gene_umbrella gu

table.name: GENE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.gene_v AS SELECT * FROM feature WHERE type_id=1214

table.name: GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_NOIMG_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_NOIMG_V AS ( SELECT f1.feature_id, f3.feature_id as probeId FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , feature_relationship fr2 , feature f3 WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 738 AND f2.feature_id = fr2.object_id AND fr2.type_id = 607 AND fr2.subject_id = f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id = 553 UNION SELECT f1.feature_id, f2.feature_id as probeId FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 553 )

table.name: GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_V AS ( SELECT f1.feature_id , b.image_id , e.experimentsource_id FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , feature_relationship fr2 , feature f3 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss, biomedia_specimenstages bs, biomedia b, experiment e WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 738 AND f2.feature_id = fr2.object_id AND fr2.type_id = 607 AND fr2.subject_id = f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id = 553 AND f3.feature_id = et.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.specimenstages_id = bs.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id UNION SELECT f1.feature_id , b.image_id , e.experimentsource_id FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss, biomedia_specimenstages bs, biomedia b, experiment e WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 553 AND f2.feature_id = et.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.specimenstages_id = bs.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id )

table.name: GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_V_TEST
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_BASIC_V_TEST AS ( SELECT f1.feature_id , b.image_id , e.experimentsource_id, f3.feature_id as probeId FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , feature_relationship fr2 , feature f3 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss, biomedia_specimenstages bs, biomedia b, experiment e WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 738 AND f2.feature_id = fr2.object_id AND fr2.type_id = 607 AND fr2.subject_id = f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id = 553 AND f3.feature_id = et.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.specimenstages_id = bs.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id UNION SELECT f1.feature_id , b.image_id , e.experimentsource_id, f2.feature_id as probeId FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss, biomedia_specimenstages bs, biomedia b, experiment e WHERE f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr1.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id = 607 AND fr1.subject_id = f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id = 553 AND f2.feature_id = et.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.specimenstages_id = bs.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id)

table.name: GENEEXPRESSIONIMAGES_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.geneexpressionimages_v AS SELECT s.stage_number AS START, s2.stage_number AS END , sr.name AS stage_resolution, fr1.object_id , CASE WHEN ( ( s.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s.stage_number WHEN ( s.name = s2.name ) THEN s.name WHEN ( s.name != s2.name ) THEN s.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS STAGE_TEXT , b.image_id , ats.obj_to_src_phrase, a.attribution_id , a.source_name , a.source_row_id , a.attribution_type , s.stage_id , s2.rank , a.object_row_id , e.experimentsource_id, es.name AS experimentType FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f2 , feature_relationship fr2 , feature f3 , feature_relationship fr3 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss LEFT OUTER JOIN stage_resolution sr ON ss.stage_resolution_id = sr.stage_resolution_id , stage s , stage s2 , biomedia_specimenstages bs , biomedia b LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution a ON INTEGER(b.image_id)=a.object_row_id AND a.object_name ='IMAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution_type_and_source ats ON a.source_type =ats.source_type AND a.attribution_type = ats.attribution_type, experiment e , experimentsource es WHERE fr1.type_id =500 AND fr1.subject_id =f1.feature_id AND f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr2.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr2.type_id =607 AND fr2.subject_id =f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id =738 AND fr3.object_id =f2.feature_id AND fr3.type_id =607 AND fr3.subject_id =f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id =553 AND et.feature_id =f3.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.start_stage_id =s.stage_id AND ss.end_stage_id =s2.stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id =ss.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id AND e.experimentsource_id = es.experimentsource_id UNION SELECT s.stage_number AS START, s2.stage_number AS END , sr.name AS stage_resolution, fr1.object_id , CASE WHEN ( ( s.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s.stage_number WHEN ( s.name = s2.name ) THEN s.name WHEN ( s.name != s2.name ) THEN s.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS STAGE_TEXT , b.image_id , ats.obj_to_src_phrase, a.attribution_id , a.source_name , a.source_row_id , a.attribution_type , s.stage_id , s2.rank , a.object_row_id , e.experimentsource_id, es.name AS experimentType FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , feature f3 , feature_relationship fr3 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss LEFT OUTER JOIN stage_resolution sr ON ss.stage_resolution_id = sr.stage_resolution_id , stage s , stage s2 , biomedia_specimenstages bs , biomedia b LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution a ON INTEGER(b.image_id)=a.object_row_id AND a.object_name ='IMAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution_type_and_source ats ON a.source_type =ats.source_type AND a.attribution_type = ats.attribution_type, experiment e , experimentsource es WHERE fr1.type_id =500 AND fr1.subject_id =f1.feature_id AND f1.type_id =1214 AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND fr3.object_id =f1.feature_id AND fr3.type_id =607 AND fr3.subject_id =f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id =553 AND et.feature_id =f3.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.start_stage_id =s.stage_id AND ss.end_stage_id =s2.stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id =ss.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id AND e.experimentsource_id = es.experimentsource_id UNION SELECT s.stage_number AS START, s2.stage_number AS END , sr.name AS stage_resolution, fr1.object_id , CASE WHEN ( ( s.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s.stage_number WHEN ( s.name = s2.name ) THEN s.name WHEN ( s.name != s2.name ) THEN s.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS STAGE_TEXT , b.image_id , ats.obj_to_src_phrase, a.attribution_id , a.source_name , a.source_row_id , a.attribution_type , s.stage_id , s2.rank , a.object_row_id , e.experimentsource_id, es.name AS experimentType FROM feature f1 , feature_relationship fr1 , expressiontest et , specimen_stages ss LEFT OUTER JOIN stage_resolution sr ON ss.stage_resolution_id = sr.stage_resolution_id , stage s , stage s2 , biomedia_specimenstages bs , biomedia b LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution a ON INTEGER(b.image_id)=a.object_row_id AND a.object_name ='IMAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN attribution_type_and_source ats ON a.source_type =ats.source_type AND a.attribution_type = ats.attribution_type, experiment e , experimentsource es WHERE fr1.type_id =607 AND fr1.subject_id =f1.feature_id AND f1.organism_id IN(11,12,13) AND f1.type_id =553 AND et.feature_id =f1.feature_id AND et.specimen_id =ss.specimen_id AND ss.start_stage_id =s.stage_id AND ss.end_stage_id =s2.stage_id AND bs.specimenstages_id =ss.specimenstages_id AND bs.biomedia_id =b.biomedia_id AND b.experiment_id = e.experiment_id AND e.experimentsource_id = es.experimentsource_id

table.name: GENEPAGE_SYNONYM_VIEW
table.viewSql: create view genepage_synonym_view as SELECT f.feature_id, s.synonym_id, f.name, s. name synonym_name, f.full_name, f.organism_id, f.type_id, f.sortable_name, f.is_analysis FROM synonym s, feature_synonym fs, feature f WHERE s.synonym_id = fs.synonym_id AND fs.feature_id =f.feature_id and s.type_id=46

table.name: GENEPAGE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.genepage_v AS SELECT feature_id, name, full_name, organism_id, type_id, sortable_name, is_analysis, description FROM feature WHERE type_id = 1214 AND organism_id = 11

table.name: GENEPAGE_VIEW
table.viewSql: create view genepage_view as select feature_id, name, full_name, organism_id, type_id, sortable_name, is_analysis, description from feature where type_id=1214 and integer(created_by)=7

table.name: GENERIC_ONTO_GO_STATS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."GENERIC_ONTO_GO_STATS_V" ("TABLENAME", "CREATED_AT", "CREATED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "RECCOUNT") AS select 'CVTERM' as tablename, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) as reccount from (select * from CVTERM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_DBXREF where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM_DBXREF.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'FEATURE_CVTERM_DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from FEATURE_CVTERM_DBXREF where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, FEATURE_CVTERM, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and FEATURE_CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERM.CVTERM_ID and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID AND FEATURE_CVTERM_DBXREF.FEATURE_CVTERM_ID = FEATURE_CVTERM.FEATURE_CVTERM_ID )) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'FEATURE_CVTERM', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from FEATURE_CVTERM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and FEATURE_CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERM.CVTERM_ID and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID )) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'FEATURE_DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from FEATURE_DBXREF where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = FEATURE_DBXREF.DBXREF_ID )) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERMSYNONYM', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERMSYNONYM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERMSYNONYM.CVTERM_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP.SUBJECT_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from DBXREF where db_id = 512 ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by

table.name: GENERIC_ONTO_STATS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."GENERIC_ONTO_STATS_V" ("TABLENAME", "CREATED_AT", "CREATED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "RECCOUNT") AS select 'CVTERM' as tablename, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) as reccount from (select * from CVTERM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_DBXREF where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM_DBXREF.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERMSYNONYM', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERMSYNONYM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERMSYNONYM.CVTERM_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 512 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP.SUBJECT_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from DBXREF where db_id = 512 ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by

table.name: GENERIC_XAO_ONTO_STATS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."GENERIC_XAO_ONTO_STATS_V" ("TABLENAME", "CREATED_AT", "CREATED_BY", "MODIFIED_AT", "MODIFIED_BY", "RECCOUNT") AS select 'CVTERM' as tablename, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) as reccount from (select * from CVTERM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ANATOMY_ITEM' as tablename, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) as reccount from (select * from ANATOMY_ITEM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'STAGE' as tablename, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) as reccount from (select * from STAGE where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = STAGE.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_DBXREF where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM_DBXREF.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERMSYNONYM', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERMSYNONYM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERMSYNONYM.CVTERM_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ANATOMY_SYNONYM', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from ANATOMY_SYNONYM where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, ANATOMY_ITEM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM.DBXREF_ID and ANATOMY_ITEM.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID = ANATOMY_SYNONYM.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, ANATOMY_ITEM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM.DBXREF_ID and ANATOMY_ITEM.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM_CATEGORY.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, CVTERM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = CVTERM.DBXREF_ID and CVTERM.CVTERM_ID = CVTERM_RELATIONSHIP.SUBJECT_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ANATOMY_REL', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from ANATOMY_REL where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, ANATOMY_ITEM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM.DBXREF_ID and ANATOMY_ITEM.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID = ANATOMY_REL.SUBJECT_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ANATOMY_STAGE_REL', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from ANATOMY_STAGE_REL where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF, ANATOMY_ITEM where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = ANATOMY_ITEM.DBXREF_ID and ANATOMY_ITEM.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID = ANATOMY_STAGE_REL.SUBJECT_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'DBXREFPROP', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from DBXREFPROP where exists ( select 'found' from DBXREF where DBXREF.db_id = 76 and DBXREF.DBXREF_ID = DBXREFPROP.DBXREF_ID ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'ATTRIBUTION', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from ATTRIBUTION where object_name='ANATOMY_ITEM' ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'DBXREF', VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) from ( select * from DBXREF where db_id = 76 ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMM'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMM'), modified_by

table.name: GENES_MQT
table.remarks: This is an artificial MQT for gene features

table.name: GEO_DATA_PROFILE_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view db2inst1.geo_data_profile_v as with geo_rec as ( select t3.co_prop_id ,t3.curxpx_id ,t3.curxpa_id , t2.curxprel_id ,t2.paper_id ,t2.gse_id ,t2.ref_type
from db2inst1.cur_exp_method t2 , db2inst1.cur_exp_co_prop t3 where t3.curxprel_id = t2.curxprel_id ) select pst.* , ( select listagg( tx.curxpxm_id,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tx.curxpx_id) from db2inst1.cur_exp_tx tx where tx.curxpx_id = pst.curxpx_id group by tx.curxpx_id ) tx_context , ( select listagg( cx.curxpc_id,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cx.curxpa_id) from db2inst1.cur_exp_condition cx where cx.curxpa_id = pst.curxpa_id group by cx.curxpa_id ) cx_context
from geo_rec pst

table.name: GFF3ATTS
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."GFF3ATTS" ( "FEATURE_ID" , "TYPE" , "ATTRIBUTE" ) AS SELECT fcv.feature_id ,'Ontology_term' AS "TYPE" ,dr.accession AS ATTRIBUTE FROM feature_cvterm fcv JOIN cvterm cv ON cv.cvterm_id = fcv.cvterm_id JOIN dbxref dr ON dr.dbxref_id = cv.dbxref_id UNION ALL SELECT fdr.feature_id ,'Dbxref' AS "TYPE" ,d.name || ':' || dr.accession AS ATTRIBUTE FROM dbxref dr JOIN feature_dbxref fdr ON fdr.dbxref_id = dr.dbxref_id JOIN db d ON d.db_id = dr.db_id WHERE d.name <> 'GFF_source' UNION ALL SELECT f.feature_id ,'Alias' AS "TYPE" ,s.name AS ATTRIBUTE FROM feature f JOIN feature_synonym fs ON fs.feature_id = f.feature_id JOIN "SYNONYM" s ON s.synonym_id = fs.synonym_id -- WHERE f.name <> s.name -- checked by trigger UNION ALL SELECT fp.feature_id ,cv.name AS "TYPE" ,fp.value AS ATTRIBUTE FROM featureprop fp JOIN cvterm cv ON cv.cvterm_id = fp.type_id

table.name: GFFATTS
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."GFFATTS" ( "FEATURE_ID" , "TYPE" , "ATTRIBUTE" ) AS SELECT fct.feature_id ,'cvterm' AS "TYPE" ,ct.name AS ATTRIBUTE FROM feature_cvterm fct JOIN cvterm ct ON ct.cvterm_id = fct.cvterm_id UNION ALL SELECT fdr.feature_id ,'dbxref' AS "TYPE" ,d.name || ':' || dr.accession AS ATTRIBUTE FROM feature_dbxref fdr JOIN dbxref dr ON dr.dbxref_id = fdr.dbxref_id JOIN db d ON d.db_id = dr.db_id UNION ALL SELECT fs.feature_id ,'synonym' AS "TYPE" ,s.name AS ATTRIBUTE FROM feature_synonym fs JOIN "SYNONYM" s ON s.synonym_id = fs.synonym_id UNION ALL SELECT fp.feature_id ,cv.name ,fp.value AS ATTRIBUTE FROM featureprop fp JOIN cvterm cv ON cv.cvterm_id = fp.type_id

table.name: HAS_ASSAY_XPA_V
table.viewSql: -- version 2 -- consolidated view of data including details for each profile entry -- missing tissue_name, tissue_dbxref_id, tissue_accession create or replace view db2inst1.has_assay_xpa_v as with has_assay as ( select t120.curxpa_id --, t110.start_stg_dbxref_id , coalesce( (select cvt.name from stage cvt, dbxref dbx where cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. start_stg_dbxref_id ),'_') ||'|'|| -- t120.start_stg_name coalesce( (select cvt.name from stage cvt, dbxref dbx where cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. end_stg_dbxref_id ),'_') ||'|'|| -- t120.end_stg_dbxref_id -- coalesce(t120.tissue_name,'_') ||'|'|| -- never populated -- coalesce(t120.assaytype,'_') ||'|'|| coalesce( ( select cvt1.name from cvterm cvt1 where cvt1.dbxref_id = t120.assaytype_dbxref_id ),'_') ||'|'|| -- coalesce(t120.moleculeextracted,'_') assay_info coalesce(( select cvt1.name from cvterm cvt1 where cvt1.dbxref_id = t120.extmol_dbxref_id ),'_') assay_info --, t120.assaytype_dbxref_id, t120.extmol_dbxref_id -- lookup stage based on dbxref given , (select cvt.name from stage cvt, dbxref dbx where cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. start_stg_dbxref_id ) start_stg_name --, t120.end_stg_name , (select cvt.name from stage cvt, dbxref dbx where cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. end_stg_dbxref_id ) end_stg_name --, t120.start_stg_accession , (select db.name ||':'|| dbx.accession from stage cvt, dbxref dbx, db where dbx.db_id = db.db_id and cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. start_stg_dbxref_id ) start_stg_accession --, t120.end_stg_accession , (select db.name ||':'|| dbx.accession from stage cvt, dbxref dbx, db where dbx.db_id = db.db_id and cvt.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120. end_stg_dbxref_id ) end_stg_accession , ( select cvt1.name from cvterm cvt1 where cvt1.dbxref_id = t120.assaytype_dbxref_id ) assaytype_name , ( select cvt1.name from cvterm cvt1 where cvt1.dbxref_id = t120.extmol_dbxref_id ) extmol_name , ( select db.name ||':'||dbx1.accession from dbxref dbx1, db where dbx1.db_id = db.db_id and dbx1.dbxref_id = t120.assaytype_dbxref_id ) assaytype_accession , ( select db.name ||':'||dbx2.accession from cvterm cvt, dbxref dbx, cvterm_relationship cvr, cvterm cvt2, dbxref dbx2, db where dbx2.db_id = db.db_id and dbx.dbxref_id = t120.assaytype_dbxref_id and dbx.dbxref_id = cvt.dbxref_id and dbx.db_id = 685 -- XED and cvr.subject_id = cvt.cvterm_id and cvr.type_id = 65742 and cvr.object_id = cvt2.cvterm_id and cvt2.dbxref_id = dbx2.dbxref_id and dbx2.db_id = 739 -- ECO ) assaytype_eco_accession , ( select db.name ||':'||dbx1.accession from dbxref dbx1, db where dbx1.db_id = db.db_id and dbx1.dbxref_id = t120.extmol_dbxref_id ) extmol_accession -- , ( select db.name ||':'||dbx1.accession from dbxref dbx1, db where dbx1.db_id = db.db_id and dbx1.dbxref_id = t120.tissue_dbxref_id ) tissue_accession , ( select ai.name from anatomy_item ai, dbxref dbx1, db where ai.dbxref_id = dbx1.dbxref_id and dbx1.db_id = db.db_id and dbx1.dbxref_id = t120.tissue_dbxref_id ) tissue_name , t120.tissue_dbxref_id -- select t120.* from cur_exp_condition t120 --where t120.curxpa_id = 17965 ) select as1.CURXPA_ID , as1.ASSAY_INFO , as1.START_STG_NAME , as1.END_STG_NAME , as1.START_STG_ACCESSION , as1.END_STG_ACCESSION , as1.ASSAYTYPE_NAME , as1.EXTMOL_NAME , as1.ASSAYTYPE_ACCESSION , as1.assaytype_eco_accession , as1.EXTMOL_ACCESSION , as1.tissue_name , as1.tissue_accession , as1.tissue_dbxref_id from has_assay as1

table.name: HAS_FROG_ASSAY_INFO_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view db2inst1.has_frog_assay_info_v as with m1 as ( select paper_id,gse_id , count( gse_id ) over ( partition by paper_id ) gse_count , count(*) reccount from geo_data_profile_v where gse_id is not null group by paper_id, gse_id ), m2 as ( select * from m1 where gse_count > 1 ) select t2.* ,( select listagg( xptx.ref_name,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY xptx.curxpx_id) from db2inst1.cur_exp_experiment xptx where xptx.curxpx_id = t2.curxpx_id group by xptx.curxpx_id ) frog_info ,( select listagg( xptx.frog_info,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY xptx.curxpx_id) from db2inst1.has_xpx_frog_info_v xptx where xptx.curxpx_id = t2.curxpx_id group by xptx.curxpx_id ) frog_info_context ,( select listagg( xpa.ref_name,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY xpa.curxpa_id) from db2inst1.cur_exp_assay xpa where xpa.curxpa_id = t2.curxpa_id group by xpa.curxpa_id ) assay_info ,( select listagg( xpa.assay_info,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY xpa.curxpa_id) from db2inst1.has_xpa_assay_info_v xpa where xpa.curxpa_id = t2.curxpa_id group by xpa.curxpa_id ) assay_info_context
from geo_data_profile_v t2 , m2 where m2.paper_id = t2.paper_id and m2.gse_id = t2.gse_id --and t2.tx_context is not null --order by t2.paper_id, t2.gse_id

table.name: HAS_XPA_ASSAY_INFO_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view db2inst1.has_xpa_assay_info_v as with has_assay as ( select t120.curxpa_id --, t110.start_stg_dbxref_id , coalesce(t120.start_stg_name,'_') ||'|'|| coalesce(t120.end_stg_name,'_') ||'|'|| -- coalesce(t120.tissue_name,'_') ||'|'|| -- never populated coalesce(t120.assaytype,'_') assay_info -- coalesce(t120.moleculeextracted,'_') assay_info --, t120.assaytype_dbxref_id, t120.extmol_dbxref_id , t115.curxprel_id , t115.ref_name , t115.ref_type , t115.paper_id --, t120.* from db2inst1.cur_exp_assay t115, db2inst1.cur_exp_condition t120 where t115.curxpa_id = t120.curxpa_id ) select * from has_assay

table.name: HAS_XPX_FROG_INFO_V
IMAGE
table.remarks: Annotation for an image. Note that not all images will have annotation.

column.name: IMAGE_ID
column.remarks: An image in Xenbase.

column.name: ALT
column.remarks: contents for html Alt key if image is not displayed

column.name: HAS_THUMBNAIL
column.remarks: indicates if the Image has a thumbnail (0,1)

column.name: HAS_SUPPLEMENTAL
column.remarks: indicates if there is a supplemental image (0,1)

column.name: ANNOTATION_MARKUP
column.remarks: Stores the XML version of the figure caption with link matching information

table.name: IMAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.IMAGE_incl_del_v (IMAGE_ID, ALT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, HAS_SUPPLEMENTAL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, TEMPORARY, HAS_NATIVE,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.IMAGE_ID, t.ALT, t.HAS_THUMBNAIL, t.HAS_SUPPLEMENTAL, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.TEMPORARY, t.HAS_NATIVE, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.IMAGE t UNION SELECT a.IMAGE_ID, a.ALT, a.HAS_THUMBNAIL, a.HAS_SUPPLEMENTAL, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.TEMPORARY, a.HAS_NATIVE,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_IMAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: IMAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.IMAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (IMAGE_ID, ALT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, HAS_SUPPLEMENTAL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, TEMPORARY, HAS_NATIVE,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.IMAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: IMAGE_TYPE
table.remarks: File extension indicating type

column.name: TYPE
column.remarks: Type of file (e.g. jpeg, gif), this value will not change

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: Description of the file type

column.name: FILE_EXTENSION
column.remarks: extension that is appended to the filename to indicate type

table.name: INTERACT_AGED_STATS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE view db2inst1.interact_aged_stats_v as select 'INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP-AGED' rowname, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) reccount from ( select * from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP where 1=1 and type_id = 66441 --5276364 --5276364 746 gene interaction identified in humans and created_by = 3650 and ( ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and modified_at is null ) OR ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at) -2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) ) ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP-TOUCHED' rowname, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) reccount from ( select * from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP where 1=1 and type_id = 66441 --5276364 746 gene interaction identified in humans and created_by = 3650 and ( ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') > ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and modified_at is null ) OR VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') > ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at) -2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'INTERACT_ATTRIB-AGED' rowname, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) reccount from ( select * from DB2INST1.INTERACT_ATTRIB where 1=1 and dbxref_id = 5276364 --5276364 746 gene interaction identified in humans and created_by = 3650 and ( ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and modified_at is null ) OR ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') < ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at) -2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) ) ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD'), modified_by UNION ALL select 'INTERACT_ATTRIB-TOUCHED' rowname, VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') created_at , created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') modified_at, modified_by , count(*) reccount from ( select * from DB2INST1.INTERACT_ATTRIB where 1=1 and dbxref_id = 5276364 --5276364 746 gene interaction identified in humans and created_by = 3650 and ( ( VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD') > ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at)-2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) and modified_at is null ) OR VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD') > ( select VARCHAR_FORMAT(max(t2.created_at) -2 DAYS,'YYYYMMDD') from DB2INST1.INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP t2 where t2.type_id = 66441 and t2.created_by = 3650 ) ) ) group by VARCHAR_FORMAT(created_at,'YYYYMMDD'), created_by, VARCHAR_FORMAT(modified_at,'YYYYMMDD'), modified_by

table.name: INTERACT_ATTRIB
table.remarks: reference to evidence for this interaction and the key for grouping genes that form the interaction

column.name: INTERACT_GROUP_ID
column.remarks: group identifier supplied by INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP_SEQ

column.name: PUBMED_ID
column.remarks: evidence to paper reference identifying interaction

column.name: DETECTION_METHOD
column.remarks: technique used to identify interaction

column.name: INTACT_ID
column.remarks: evidence to EBI reference to interaction

column.name: DBXREF_ID
column.remarks: dbxref_id as a classifier for GENE INTERACTION such as IntAct db ie:gene interaction identified in humans

column.name: PARAM_VALUE_A
column.remarks: qty associated with param A

column.name: PARAM_DESCR_A
column.remarks: name associated with param A

table.name: INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP
table.remarks: single column listing of feature_id and grouping by INTERACT_ATTRIB_ID that carries the evidence for this interaction

column.name: GENE_INTERACT_SYMBOL_ID
column.remarks: Feature ID for Ortholog gene involved in interaction

column.name: GENE_INTERACT_XB_ID
column.remarks: Feature ID for XB gene involved in interaction

column.name: INTERACT_GROUP_ID
column.remarks: group identifier supplied by INTERACT_RELATIONSHIP_SEQ

column.name: TYPE_ID
column.remarks: cvterm_id as a classifier for GENE INTERACTION ie:pairwise interacts with

table.name: JGI_MODELS_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.jgi_models_v AS SELECT xtg.feature_id AS xt_gene_id, jg.feature_id AS jgi_gene_id, jm.feature_id AS jgi_mRNA_id, jp.feature_id AS jgi_polypeptide_id FROM gene_v xtg, feature_relationship fr1, gene_v jg, mRNA_v jm, polypeptide_v jp WHERE xtg.feature_id = fr1.subject_id AND fr1.type_id = 38 AND fr1.object_id = jg.feature_id AND jg.feature_id = jm.gene_id

table.name: JOB
table.remarks: Job is a job advertisement that may be posed by a lab organization or anyone registered with Xenbase.

column.name: CLOSE_DT
column.remarks: closing date for the job.

column.name: REMOVE_DT
column.remarks: the job will be removed at the end of this date.

column.name: EXTENDED_DT
column.remarks: allows person to extend a job to this date.

column.name: SALARY_DESC
column.remarks: range for salary.

column.name: POSTING_URL
column.remarks: url for a further description of the posting.

column.name: EMPLOYER_NAME
column.remarks: Name of the employer if the person entering the job is not associating it with an organization or lab in the Xenopus community. Could also have the department name.

column.name: EMPLOYER_URL
column.remarks: can hold the url for a web page of the employer.

column.name: SUBMIT_EMAIL
column.remarks: email that the person can submit their applicationt to.

column.name: TITLE
column.remarks: job title

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: job description

column.name: CITY
column.remarks: city the job is located in

column.name: STATE
column.remarks: state/province the job is located in

column.name: APPROVED
column.remarks: the job has been approved

column.name: CONTACT_ID
column.remarks: a contact in Xenbase

table.name: JOB_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOB_incl_del_v (JOB_ID, JOB_TYPE_ID, CLOSE_DT, REMOVE_DT, EXTENDED_DT, SALARY_DESC, POSTING_URL, EMPLOYER_NAME, EMPLOYER_URL, SUBMIT_EMAIL, TITLE, CITY, STATE, APPROVED, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, CONTACT_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, LAB_ID, COUNTRY_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.JOB_ID, t.JOB_TYPE_ID, t.CLOSE_DT, t.REMOVE_DT, t.EXTENDED_DT, t.SALARY_DESC, t.POSTING_URL, t.EMPLOYER_NAME, t.EMPLOYER_URL, t.SUBMIT_EMAIL, t.TITLE, t.CITY, t.STATE, t.APPROVED, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.CONTACT_ID, t.ORGANIZATION_ID, t.LAB_ID, t.COUNTRY_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.JOB t UNION SELECT a.JOB_ID, a.JOB_TYPE_ID, a.CLOSE_DT, a.REMOVE_DT, a.EXTENDED_DT, a.SALARY_DESC, a.POSTING_URL, a.EMPLOYER_NAME, a.EMPLOYER_URL, a.SUBMIT_EMAIL, a.TITLE, a.CITY, a.STATE, a.APPROVED, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.CONTACT_ID, a.ORGANIZATION_ID, a.LAB_ID, a.COUNTRY_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_JOB a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: JOB_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOB_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (JOB_ID, JOB_TYPE_ID, CLOSE_DT, REMOVE_DT, EXTENDED_DT, SALARY_DESC, POSTING_URL, EMPLOYER_NAME, EMPLOYER_URL, SUBMIT_EMAIL, TITLE, CITY, STATE, APPROVED, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, CONTACT_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, LAB_ID, COUNTRY_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.JOB_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: JOBTYPE
table.remarks: Validation table: Type of job e.g. faculty, post doc

table.name: JOURNAL
table.remarks: journal is a serial of papers

column.name: JOURNAL_ID
column.remarks: Xenbase accession number for journal

column.name: TITLE
column.remarks: Full title of the journal

column.name: MEDLINE_ABBREVIATION
column.remarks: abbreviation for journal used by medline.

column.name: ISO_ABBREVIATION
column.remarks: ISO standard abbreviation for journal

column.name: ISSN
column.remarks: International Standard Serial Number

column.name: URL
column.remarks: URL for journal

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Application user that created the record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified. Null if never modified.

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: Application user that last changed the record

column.name: PUBLISHER_ID
column.remarks: publisher of the journal

table.name: JOURNAL_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOURNAL_incl_del_v (JOURNAL_ID, TITLE, MEDLINE_ABBREVIATION, ISO_ABBREVIATION, ISSN, URL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, PUBLISHER_ID, SCRAPABLE,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.JOURNAL_ID, t.TITLE, t.MEDLINE_ABBREVIATION, t.ISO_ABBREVIATION, t.ISSN, t.URL, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.PUBLISHER_ID, t.SCRAPABLE, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.JOURNAL t UNION SELECT a.JOURNAL_ID, a.TITLE, a.MEDLINE_ABBREVIATION, a.ISO_ABBREVIATION, a.ISSN, a.URL, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.PUBLISHER_ID, a.SCRAPABLE,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_JOURNAL a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: JOURNAL_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOURNAL_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (JOURNAL_ID, TITLE, MEDLINE_ABBREVIATION, ISO_ABBREVIATION, ISSN, URL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, PUBLISHER_ID, SCRAPABLE,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.JOURNAL_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

column.name: JOURNALISSUE_ID
column.remarks: unique id for the journal issue

column.name: VOLUME
column.remarks: volume of the journal

column.name: ISSUE
column.remarks: issue of the journal

column.name: PUBLICATION_DATE
column.remarks: data of publications, id data conforms to a normal data type. If data is non-conforming it should still be translated some form of pulication_date for searches

column.name: NON_CONFORMING_DATE
column.remarks: data that does not cofnrm to standard date type- e.g. Nov-Dec

column.name: DATE_STRING
column.remarks: either the data string or the noncomforming data string

column.name: JOURNAL_ID
column.remarks: id of the journal that the issue is a part of

table.name: JOURNALISSUE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOURNALISSUE_incl_del_v (JOURNALISSUE_ID, VOLUME, ISSUE, PUBLICATION_DATE, NON_CONFORMING_DATE, DATE_STRING, JOURNAL_ID, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.JOURNALISSUE_ID, t.VOLUME, t.ISSUE, t.PUBLICATION_DATE, t.NON_CONFORMING_DATE, t.DATE_STRING, t.JOURNAL_ID, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.JOURNALISSUE t UNION SELECT a.JOURNALISSUE_ID, a.VOLUME, a.ISSUE, a.PUBLICATION_DATE, a.NON_CONFORMING_DATE, a.DATE_STRING, a.JOURNAL_ID, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_JOURNALISSUE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: JOURNALISSUE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.JOURNALISSUE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (JOURNALISSUE_ID, VOLUME, ISSUE, PUBLICATION_DATE, NON_CONFORMING_DATE, DATE_STRING, JOURNAL_ID, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.JOURNALISSUE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LAB
table.remarks: Lab can be any research lab involved with Xenopus research.

column.name: SHORT_RESEARCH_INTERESTS
column.remarks: short description of research appears in descriptions of labs.

column.name: LONG_RESEARCH_INTERESTS
column.remarks: long description of lab research as related to Xenopus

column.name: OTHER_INFORMATION
column.remarks: information about the lab not associated with Xenopus

column.name: URL
column.remarks: Uniform Resource Indicator for the lab home page/

column.name: ADDRESS_ID
column.remarks: lab mailing address

column.name: PICTURE_ID
column.remarks: id for lab picture

column.name: APPROVED
column.remarks: boolean indicating if the entry for lab has been approved. Lab entries are automatically approved on creation.

column.name: IS_OPEN
column.remarks: indicates whether anyone can join a lab, or they have to be approved

table.name: LAB_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LAB_incl_del_v (LAB_ID, NAME, INSTITUTION, SHORT_RESEARCH_INTERESTS, URL, ADDRESS_ID, PICTURE_ID, APPROVED, IS_OPEN, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, ORGANIZATION_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LAB_ID, t.NAME, t.INSTITUTION, t.SHORT_RESEARCH_INTERESTS, t.URL, t.ADDRESS_ID, t.PICTURE_ID, t.APPROVED, t.IS_OPEN, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.ORGANIZATION_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LAB t UNION SELECT a.LAB_ID, a.NAME, a.INSTITUTION, a.SHORT_RESEARCH_INTERESTS, a.URL, a.ADDRESS_ID, a.PICTURE_ID, a.APPROVED, a.IS_OPEN, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.ORGANIZATION_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LAB a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LAB_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LAB_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LAB_ID, NAME, INSTITUTION, SHORT_RESEARCH_INTERESTS, URL, ADDRESS_ID, PICTURE_ID, APPROVED, IS_OPEN, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, ORGANIZATION_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LAB_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LAST_SEARCH_INDEX_V
table.viewSql: create view last_search_index_v as select max(created_at) as time from batch_job_run where batch_job_id in (3,4)

table.name: LIBRARY
table.remarks: A library of some form of genetic material. Can also be a singleton for a clone or something that is not in a cDNA.

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: name of the library

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: Description of the library

column.name: LIBRARYTYPE_ID
column.remarks: id indicating library type (e.g. cDNA library)

column.name: SINGLETON
column.remarks: indicates this library contains only one item. Used for clones that are not part of a library.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person in Xenbase that created record

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: creation time

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: id of person in xenbase to last modify the record, null if never modified at

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

table.name: LIBRARY_DBXREF_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_DBXREF_incl_del_v (LIBRARY_DBXREF_ID, LIBRARY_ID, DBXREF_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LIBRARY_DBXREF_ID, t.LIBRARY_ID, t.DBXREF_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY_DBXREF t UNION SELECT a.LIBRARY_DBXREF_ID, a.LIBRARY_ID, a.DBXREF_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LIBRARY_DBXREF a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LIBRARY_DBXREF_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_DBXREF_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LIBRARY_DBXREF_ID, LIBRARY_ID, DBXREF_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY_DBXREF_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LIBRARY_FEATURE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_FEATURE_incl_del_v (LIBRARY_FEATURE_ID, LIBRARY_ID, FEATURE_ID, TYPE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LIBRARY_FEATURE_ID, t.LIBRARY_ID, t.FEATURE_ID, t.TYPE_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY_FEATURE t UNION SELECT a.LIBRARY_FEATURE_ID, a.LIBRARY_ID, a.FEATURE_ID, a.TYPE_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LIBRARY_FEATURE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LIBRARY_FEATURE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_FEATURE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LIBRARY_FEATURE_ID, LIBRARY_ID, FEATURE_ID, TYPE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY_FEATURE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LIBRARY_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_incl_del_v (LIBRARY_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, LIBRARYTYPE_ID, SINGLETON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, EXPERIMENT_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LIBRARY_ID, t.NAME, t.DESCRIPTION, t.LIBRARYTYPE_ID, t.SINGLETON, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.EXPERIMENT_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY t UNION SELECT a.LIBRARY_ID, a.NAME, a.DESCRIPTION, a.LIBRARYTYPE_ID, a.SINGLETON, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.EXPERIMENT_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LIBRARY a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LIBRARY_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LIBRARY_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LIBRARY_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, LIBRARYTYPE_ID, SINGLETON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, EXPERIMENT_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LIBRARY_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LIMIT_SHOW_TISSUE_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view limit_show_tissue_v as select * from db2inst1.expression_sum_xao_list

column.name: NXR
column.remarks: stock center boolean

column.name: EXRC
column.remarks: stock center boolean

column.name: NBRP
column.remarks: stock center boolean

column.name: XLRRI
column.remarks: stock center boolean

column.name: CRB
column.remarks: stock center boolean

column.name: XLRRI_RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

column.name: CRB_RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

column.name: NXR_RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

column.name: EXRC_RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

column.name: NBRP_RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

column.name: MUTANT_GENE_ID
column.remarks: mutated genes for a line

column.name: BACKGROUND_STRAIN_ID
column.remarks: line_id representing the background for this line record

checkConstraint.constraint: (SMALLINT(WILD_TYPE)=1 AND (SMALLINT(MUTANT)=0 AND SMALLINT(TRANSGENIC_LINE)=0)) OR (SMALLINT(WILD_TYPE)=0 AND (SMALLINT(MUTANT)=1 OR SMALLINT(TRANSGENIC_LINE)=1))
checkConstraint.name: WILDTYPE_CHK

table.name: LINE_FEATURE
table.remarks: multiple mutant gene features for a line.

column.name: TYPE_ID
column.remarks: mutant, trans, wildtype

table.name: LINE_IMAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_IMAGE_incl_del_v (LINE_ID, IMAGE_ID, TYPE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LINE_ID, t.IMAGE_ID, t.TYPE_ID, t.COMMENT, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINE_IMAGE t UNION SELECT a.LINE_ID, a.IMAGE_ID, a.TYPE_ID, a.COMMENT, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINE_IMAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINE_IMAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_IMAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LINE_ID, IMAGE_ID, TYPE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINE_IMAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_incl_del_v (LINE_ID, NAME, TAXONOMY, MOTHER_ID, FATHER_ID, INBRED_GENERATION, WILD_TYPE, TRANSGENIC_LINE, MUTANT, PHYLOGENY_DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, BREEDING_TYPE, HOMOZYGOUS, MTAREQUIRED,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LINE_ID, t.NAME, t.TAXONOMY, t.MOTHER_ID, t.FATHER_ID, t.INBRED_GENERATION, t.WILD_TYPE, t.TRANSGENIC_LINE, t.MUTANT, t.PHYLOGENY_DESCRIPTION, t.DESCRIPTION, t.COMMENT, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.BREEDING_TYPE, t.HOMOZYGOUS, t.MTAREQUIRED, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINE t UNION SELECT a.LINE_ID, a.NAME, a.TAXONOMY, a.MOTHER_ID, a.FATHER_ID, a.INBRED_GENERATION, a.WILD_TYPE, a.TRANSGENIC_LINE, a.MUTANT, a.PHYLOGENY_DESCRIPTION, a.DESCRIPTION, a.COMMENT, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.BREEDING_TYPE, a.HOMOZYGOUS, a.MTAREQUIRED,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINE_RRID_V
table.viewSql: CREATE view DB2INST1.LINE_RRID_V AS with rrid_list as ( select LINE_ID ,DB2INST1.LINE.XLRRI_RRID AS RRID, 'XLRRI' AS sc from DB2INST1.LINE UNION select LINE_ID ,DB2INST1.LINE.CRB_RRID, 'CRB' AS sc from DB2INST1.LINE UNION select LINE_ID ,DB2INST1.LINE.NXR_RRID, 'NXR' AS sc from DB2INST1.LINE UNION select LINE_ID ,DB2INST1.LINE.EXRC_RRID, 'EXRC' AS sc from DB2INST1.LINE UNION select LINE_ID ,DB2INST1.LINE.NBRP_RRID, 'NBRP' AS sc from DB2INST1.LINE ) select LINE_ID,TRIM(RRID) as RRID, sc from rrid_list where rrid is not null and length(rrid) > 1

table.name: LINE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LINE_ID, NAME, TAXONOMY, MOTHER_ID, FATHER_ID, INBRED_GENERATION, WILD_TYPE, TRANSGENIC_LINE, MUTANT, PHYLOGENY_DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, BREEDING_TYPE, HOMOZYGOUS, MTAREQUIRED,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINE_SUPPLIER
table.remarks: Link between a line and its supplier. Note there could be more than one link between a line and the same supplier if they have more than one product name, per the dbxref

column.name: RRID
column.remarks: stock center identifier

table.name: LINE_SUPPLIER_CATALOG
table.remarks: Stock info and generation for a product line available from a supplier.

column.name: GENERATION_NUM
column.remarks: generation of line available from supplier F0 to Fn

column.name: GENERATION_NAME
column.remarks: generation of line available from supplier

column.name: IN_STOCK
column.remarks: stock status 0 for none and 1 for available

column.name: STOCK_COUNT
column.remarks: optional estimated stock count

table.name: LINE_TRANSGENE
table.remarks: Describes association between line and its transgene.

column.name: LINKAGE_GROUP
column.remarks: This is the feature id for the linkage group that the chromosome is aligned against

column.name: SEQUENCE_LOCATION
column.remarks: Interval coordinate of the insertion in the linkage_group

column.name: THREE_PRIME_FLANKINGSEQ_ID
column.remarks: A sequence for the area flanking the 3 prime end of the transgene

column.name: FIVE_PRIME_FLANKINGSEQ_ID
column.remarks: A sequence for the area flanking the 3 prime end of the transgene

column.name: ORGANISM_ID
column.remarks: identifis the organism sequenced in the draft used to determine the insertion location

column.name: DRAFT_VERSION
column.remarks: version of the genome sequence draft used to determine the insertion location

checkConstraint.constraint: (NOT ((LINKAGE_GROUP IS NULL) AND (SEQUENCE_LOCATION IS NOT NULL))) AND (NOT ((LINKAGE_GROUP IS NOT NULL) AND (SEQUENCE_LOCATION IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: LN_TG_LG_AND_SL

table.name: LINE_VARIETY_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_VARIETY_incl_del_v (VARIETY_ID, LINE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.VARIETY_ID, t.LINE_ID, t.COMMENT, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINE_VARIETY t UNION SELECT a.VARIETY_ID, a.LINE_ID, a.COMMENT, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINE_VARIETY a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINE_VARIETY_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINE_VARIETY_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (VARIETY_ID, LINE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINE_VARIETY_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINK_MATCH
table.remarks: row id of the record in the source

column.name: ROW_ID
column.remarks: row id of the table where the source is matched

column.name: MATCH
column.remarks: The value that was matched

column.name: FIRST_SENTENCE
column.remarks: The fist sentence that the match appears in (for Blobs)

table.name: LINK_MATCH_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_incl_del_v (LINK_MATCH_ID, LINK_SOURCE_ID, ROW_ID, MATCH, FIRST_SENTENCE, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, WEB_LINK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LINK_MATCH_ID, t.LINK_SOURCE_ID, t.ROW_ID, t.MATCH, t.FIRST_SENTENCE, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.WEB_LINK, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH t UNION SELECT a.LINK_MATCH_ID, a.LINK_SOURCE_ID, a.ROW_ID, a.MATCH, a.FIRST_SENTENCE, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.WEB_LINK,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINK_MATCH a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINK_MATCH_OCC
table.remarks: position of the occurrence. e.g. 2nd incident of the word is 2.

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: person id of the user that last modified the record

column.name: LINK_MATCH_ID
column.remarks: id of the match

column.name: OCCURRENCE
column.remarks: first occurrence of the match

column.name: ACTUAL_MATCH
column.remarks: The actual match. (This could be some form of modification such as xpax matching pax)

column.name: FALSE_MATCH
column.remarks: a boolean indication if a match was actually false. For example identifying the negation not as Not.

table.name: LINK_MATCH_OCC_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_OCC_incl_del_v (CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, LINK_MATCH_ID, OCCURRENCE, ACTUAL_MATCH, FALSE_MATCH,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.LINK_MATCH_ID, t.OCCURRENCE, t.ACTUAL_MATCH, t.FALSE_MATCH, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_OCC t UNION SELECT a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.LINK_MATCH_ID, a.OCCURRENCE, a.ACTUAL_MATCH, a.FALSE_MATCH,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINK_MATCH_OCC a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINK_MATCH_OCC_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_OCC_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, LINK_MATCH_ID, OCCURRENCE, ACTUAL_MATCH, FALSE_MATCH,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_OCC_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINK_MATCH_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LINK_MATCH_ID, LINK_SOURCE_ID, ROW_ID, MATCH, FIRST_SENTENCE, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, WEB_LINK,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM
table.remarks: the association between a match and a target. There may be multipe targets associated with a single match if several targets are the same actual match string. In the future this may alos store matches to phrases as wll

column.name: LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: autogenerated id

column.name: BATCH_JOB_RUN_ID
column.remarks: id of the batch job that this record was matched in.

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: LINK_MATCH_ID
column.remarks: that math to the source

column.name: LINK_TARGET_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: target involved in the match

table.name: LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_incl_del_v (LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_ID, BATCH_JOB_RUN_ID, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, LINK_MATCH_ID, LINK_TARGET_ITEM_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_ID, t.BATCH_JOB_RUN_ID, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.LINK_MATCH_ID, t.LINK_TARGET_ITEM_ID, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM t UNION SELECT a.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_ID, a.BATCH_JOB_RUN_ID, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.LINK_MATCH_ID, a.LINK_TARGET_ITEM_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_ID, BATCH_JOB_RUN_ID, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, LINK_MATCH_ID, LINK_TARGET_ITEM_ID,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINK_MATCH_TARGET_ITEM_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: LINK_MOD_SOURCE
table.remarks: a list of records in each source that have been modified and should be searched again.

column.name: ROW_ID
column.remarks: primary key id of the source object record that has been changed

column.name: TIME_CHANGED
column.remarks: The time that the source was changed.

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: person id of the user that last modified the record

column.name: LINK_SOURCE_ID
column.remarks: id of the source object

table.name: LINK_MOD_TARGET
table.remarks: a list of sources that have been modified and should therefore be searched again

column.name: ROW_ID
column.remarks: primary key id of the record that has been modified

column.name: TIME_CHANGED
column.remarks: The time that the source was changed.

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: person id of the user that last modified the record

column.name: LINK_TARGET_ID
column.remarks: link target object that has been modified

table.name: LINK_NEW_SOURCE
table.remarks: a list of records in each source that have been newly created.

table.name: LINK_SOURCE
table.remarks: Specifies the source objects to be searched for links by table and column. (e.g. paper abstracts) . Corresponds to table columns.

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.remarks: table where the txt column being searched is

column.name: COL_NAME
column.remarks: text column being searched for links

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: person id of the user that last modified the record

table.name: LINK_TARGET
table.remarks: objects that will be targets in searches. These corresopond to columns in a table. However, columns may be searched only if records contain certain values.

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.remarks: Table of the target field (e.g. feature)

column.name: COL_NAME
column.remarks: column where the text is being searched (for example the name field in feature)

column.name: CONSTRAINT_DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: A textual description of any further constraints on the column for what is matched. For example, gene links would have type:gene and organism:xenopus

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: the timestamp when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: person id of the user that last modified the record

table.name: LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS
table.remarks: are entries in target tables that should not be searched.

column.name: LINK_TARGET_ID
column.remarks: id representing the target type of the exception

column.name: ROW_ID
column.remarks: primary key of the target exception

column.name: REASON
column.remarks: reason why this is an exception

table.name: LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS_incl_del_v (LINK_TARGET_ID, ROW_ID, REASON, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.LINK_TARGET_ID, t.ROW_ID, t.REASON, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS t UNION SELECT a.LINK_TARGET_ID, a.ROW_ID, a.REASON, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (LINK_TARGET_ID, ROW_ID, REASON, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.LINK_TARGET_EXCEPTIONS_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person_id of the user who created this record

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: timestamp when the record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
