table.name: SEQUENCE_CLONE
table.remarks: AXELDB LOADER TABLE

table.name: SINGLE_BEST_PERSON_AUTHOR_MATCH_V
table.remarks: Like best best_person_author_matches_v This query returns the best matches between person and pape author. First, confirmed mathces are chosen. Then the matches with the strictiest mathching criteria but of those only one consistnatn result
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW single_best_person_author_match_v AS (SELECT * FROM person_author_match_v pam1 WHERE pam1.confirmation_status = 'C' OR ( pam1.confirmation_status IS NULL AND integer(pam1.person_id) = (SELECT MIN(INTEGER(pam2.person_id)) FROM person_author_match_v pam2 WHERE pam2.paperauthor_id = pam1.paperauthor_id AND pam2.rank = (SELECT MAX(pam3.rank) FROM person_author_match_v pam3 WHERE pam3.paperauthor_id = pam2.paperauthor_id))) AND not exists (SELECT person_id FROM person_author_match_v pam4 WHERE pam1.person_id <> pam4.person_id AND pam1.paperauthor_id = pam4.paperauthor_id AND pam4.confirmation_status = 'C'))

table.name: SOAP_STATE_MGMT_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SOAP_STATE_MGMT_incl_del_v (STATE, ATTEMPTS, OBJECT_ID, NOTIFICATION, OBJECT_TYPE, TIMESTAMP, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.STATE, t.ATTEMPTS, t.OBJECT_ID, t.NOTIFICATION, t.OBJECT_TYPE, t.TIMESTAMP, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SOAP_STATE_MGMT t UNION SELECT a.STATE, a.ATTEMPTS, a.OBJECT_ID, a.NOTIFICATION, a.OBJECT_TYPE, a.TIMESTAMP, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SOAP_STATE_MGMT a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SOAP_STATE_MGMT_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SOAP_STATE_MGMT_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (STATE, ATTEMPTS, OBJECT_ID, NOTIFICATION, OBJECT_TYPE, TIMESTAMP, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SOAP_STATE_MGMT_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: SPECIMEN
table.remarks: A specimen must come from a contiguous set of documentation. One specimen is assumed to have come from an organism over a contiguous development period.

column.name: QUANTITY
column.remarks: if the speciman is a mix of several organism (e.g. f different frogs) the quantitiy of frogs.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person in Xenbase that created record

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: creation time

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: id of person in xenbase to last modify the record, null if never modified at

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

column.name: ANATOMY_ITEM_ID
column.remarks: primary key identifier for tissue

table.name: SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM_incl_del_v (SPECIMEN_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.SPECIMEN_ID, t.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_BY, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM t UNION SELECT a.SPECIMEN_ID, a.ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (SPECIMEN_ID, ANATOMY_ITEM_ID, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_ANATOMYITEM_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: SPECIMEN_LIBRARY
table.remarks: This details a specimen used in the construction of a library

column.name: NORMALIZED
column.remarks: has representation of mRNA from specimen been normalized so mRNAs from certain sequences are not over-represented by level of expression

column.name: SUBTRACTION
column.remarks: indicates that mRNA from this specimen is subtracted from the library

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person in Xenbase that created record

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: creation time

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: id of person in xenbase to last modify the record, null if never modified at

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

table.name: SPECIMEN_LIBRARY_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_LIBRARY_incl_del_v (NORMALIZED, SUBTRACTION, LIBRARY_ID, SPECIMEN_ID, SPECIMEN_LIBARY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.NORMALIZED, t.SUBTRACTION, t.LIBRARY_ID, t.SPECIMEN_ID, t.SPECIMEN_LIBARY_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_LIBRARY t UNION SELECT a.NORMALIZED, a.SUBTRACTION, a.LIBRARY_ID, a.SPECIMEN_ID, a.SPECIMEN_LIBARY_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SPECIMEN_LIBRARY a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SPECIMEN_LIBRARY_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_LIBRARY_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (NORMALIZED, SUBTRACTION, LIBRARY_ID, SPECIMEN_ID, SPECIMEN_LIBARY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_LIBRARY_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: SPECIMEN_STAGES
table.remarks: describes a period of interst over which a specimen is used (e.g. to make a cDNA library or in an expression experiment) or examined (in a movie)

column.name: SPECIMEN_ID
column.remarks: specimen used

column.name: START_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: stage where the periond of interest starts.

column.name: END_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: stage where period of interest ends. If the period is equal to or less than a single development stage this the same as start stage

column.name: STAGE_RESOLUTION_ID
column.remarks: Describes the resolution of the period of interest. That is is the period of interest throughout the stages described or within in them.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: Person in Xenbase that created record

column.name: CREATED_AT
column.remarks: creation time

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: id of person in xenbase to last modify the record, null if never modified at

column.name: MODIFIED_AT
column.remarks: time that the record was last modified

table.name: SPECIMEN_STAGES_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_STAGES_incl_del_v (SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, SPECIMEN_ID, START_STAGE_ID, END_STAGE_ID, STAGE_RESOLUTION_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, t.SPECIMEN_ID, t.START_STAGE_ID, t.END_STAGE_ID, t.STAGE_RESOLUTION_ID, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_STAGES t UNION SELECT a.SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, a.SPECIMEN_ID, a.START_STAGE_ID, a.END_STAGE_ID, a.STAGE_RESOLUTION_ID, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SPECIMEN_STAGES a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SPECIMEN_STAGES_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_STAGES_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (SPECIMENSTAGES_ID, SPECIMEN_ID, START_STAGE_ID, END_STAGE_ID, STAGE_RESOLUTION_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SPECIMEN_STAGES_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: STAGE
table.remarks: stage of development based on those stages designed by nieuwkoop and faber

table.name: STAGE_GENE_EXP_INSITU_AGGLST_V
table.viewSql: create or replace view stage_gene_exp_insitu_agglst_v as with show_stages as ( select rank stage_rank, 0 reccount, short_name stage_name , dbxref_id stage_dbxref_id from stage where dbxref_id in ( 536407 ,536343 ,536345 ,536347 ,536350 ,536361 ,536366 ,536370 ,536377 ) ), m1 as ( select distinct t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id from db2inst1.stage_gene_exp_insitu_mqt t1 --where gene_symbol like 'p%' --where t1.gene_id = 943452 ), full_list as ( select t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , t2.stage_rank --, t2.reccount ,case when t1.organism_id = 12 then nvl(( select max(t3.reccount) from db2inst1.stage_gene_exp_insitu_mqt t3 where t3.gene_id = t1.gene_id --and t3.stage_dbxref_id = t2.stage_dbxref_id and t3.stage_rank between t2.stage_rank -2 and t2.stage_rank + 2 ),0) else nvl(( select max(t3.reccount) from db2inst1.stage_gene_exp_insitu_mqt t3 where t3.organism_id = t1.organism_id and t3.umbrella_gene_id = t1.umbrella_gene_id --and t3.gene_id = t1.gene_id --and t3.stage_dbxref_id = t2.stage_dbxref_id and t3.stage_rank between t2.stage_rank -2 and t2.stage_rank + 2 ),0) end reccount -- , t2.stage_name , t2.stage_dbxref_id from show_stages t2, m1 t1 ) -- select t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id , LISTAGG(t1.stage_name,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.stage_rank) header_counts , LISTAGG(t1.reccount,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t1.stage_rank) detail_counts from full_list t1 group by t1.gene_id, t1.gene_symbol, t1.umbrella_gene_id, t1.umbrella_gene_symbol, t1.organism_id --order by t1.gene_id

table.name: STAGE_GENE_EXP_INSITU_MQT
table.remarks: This is an Artificial MQT for in situ hybridization Stage data from gene_expression_complete

table.name: STAGE_IMAGE
table.remarks: stores the relationships between stage and images

table.name: STAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.STAGE_incl_del_v (STAGE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ID, POSITION, ORGANISM_ID, DBXREF_ID, MODIFIED_BY, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK, LEAF_NODE, STAGE_NUMBER,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.STAGE_ID, t.NAME, t.DESCRIPTION, t.PARENT_ID, t.POSITION, t.ORGANISM_ID, t.DBXREF_ID, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.CREATED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, t.RANK, t.LEAF_NODE, t.STAGE_NUMBER, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.STAGE t UNION SELECT a.STAGE_ID, a.NAME, a.DESCRIPTION, a.PARENT_ID, a.POSITION, a.ORGANISM_ID, a.DBXREF_ID, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT, a.RANK, a.LEAF_NODE, a.STAGE_NUMBER,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_STAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: STAGE_PATTERN_A_V
table.viewSql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "DB2INST1"."STAGE_PATTERN_A_V" ("IMAGE_ID", "BIOMEDIA_ID" , "PAPER_ID" , "EXPERIMENT_ID", "SPECIMENSTAGES_ID", "SPECIMEN_ID", "START_STAGE_ID", "END_STAGE_ID" , "START_STAGE_RANK", "END_STAGE_RANK", "EXPRESSIONSTAGESTESTED_ID", "EXPRESSIONTEST_ID", "PROBE_ID", "CDNA_ID", "CDNA_NAME" , "UMBRELLA_GENE_ID", "UMBRELLA_GENE_SYMBOL", "GENE_ID", "GENE_SYMBOL", "EXPRESSED_FEATURE_ID", "EXPRESSED_FEATURE_NAME" , "EXPERIMENTSOURCE_ID", "STAGE_TEXT") AS -- select distinct --null image_id ( select image_id from biomedia b where b.biomedia_id = bs.biomedia_id ) image_id , bs.biomedia_id biomedia_id , pev.paper_id --i.image_id, b.biomedia_id , e.experiment_id, ss.specimenstages_id, ss.specimen_id, ss.start_stage_id, ss.end_stage_id, s1.rank as start_stage_rank, s2.rank as end_stage_rank , est.expressionstagestested_id, est.expressiontest_id, et.feature_id as probe_id, pc.cdna_id, pc.cdna_name, pg.umbrella_gene_id, pg.umbrella_gene_symbol, pg.gene_id, pg.gene_symbol , coalesce(pg.umbrella_gene_id,pc.cdna_id) as expressed_feature_id, coalesce(pg.umbrella_gene_symbol,pc.cdna_name) as expressed_feature_name, e.experimentsource_id , CASE WHEN ( ( s1.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s1.stage_number WHEN ( s1.name = s2.name ) THEN s1.name WHEN ( s1.name != s2.name ) THEN s1.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS stage_text --select e.experiment_id, count(*) from --image i, biomedia b, biomedia_specimenstages bs, specimen_stages ss left join biomedia_specimenstages bs ON ( ss.specimenstages_id=bs.specimenstages_id) , stage s1, stage s2 , expression_stages_tested est --left join expressionassay ea ON ( ea.expressionstagestested_id = est.expressionstagestested_id ) , experiment e left join paper_experiment_v pev ON (pev.experiment_id = e.experiment_id ) , expressiontest et left join probe_genes_v pg ON (et.feature_id=pg.probe_id) left join probe_cdnas_v pc ON (et.feature_id=pc.probe_id) where 1=1 --AND i.image_id=b.image_id AND bs.biomedia_id=b.biomedia_id AND ss.specimenstages_id=bs.specimenstages_id --AND e.experiment_id=b.experiment_id AND e.experiment_id = et.experiment_id AND s1.stage_id=ss.start_stage_id AND s2.stage_id=ss.end_stage_id AND est.specimenstages_id=ss.specimenstages_id AND et.expressiontest_id=est.expressiontest_id

table.name: STAGE_PATTERN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW stage_pattern_v as ( select i.image_id, b.biomedia_id, b.experiment_id, bs.specimenstages_id, ss.specimen_id, ss.start_stage_id, ss.end_stage_id, s1.rank as start_stage_rank, s2.rank as end_stage_rank, est.expressionstagestested_id, est.expressiontest_id, et.feature_id as probe_id, pc.cdna_id, pc.cdna_name, pg.umbrella_gene_id, pg.umbrella_gene_symbol, pg.gene_id, pg.gene_symbol, coalesce(pg.umbrella_gene_id,pc.cdna_id) as expressed_feature_id, coalesce(pg.umbrella_gene_symbol,pc.cdna_name) as expressed_feature_name, e.experimentsource_id, CASE WHEN ( ( s1.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( s2.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN s1.stage_number WHEN ( s1.name = s2.name ) THEN s1.name WHEN ( s1.name != s2.name ) THEN s1.name || ' to ' || s2.stage_number END AS stage_text from image i, biomedia b, biomedia_specimenstages bs, specimen_stages ss, stage s1, stage s2, expression_stages_tested est, expressiontest et left join probe_genes_v pg ON (et.feature_id=pg.probe_id) left join probe_cdnas_v pc ON (et.feature_id=pc.probe_id), experiment e where i.image_id=b.image_id AND bs.biomedia_id=b.biomedia_id AND ss.specimenstages_id=bs.specimenstages_id AND s1.stage_id=ss.start_stage_id AND s2.stage_id=ss.end_stage_id AND est.specimenstages_id=ss.specimenstages_id AND et.expressiontest_id=est.expressiontest_id AND e.experiment_id=b.experiment_id )

table.name: STAGE_RESOLUTION
table.remarks: descirbes the resolution for which a period of stages is identified. That is it distinguishes something that occurs throughout a period of time, or somewhere in a period of time.

table.name: STAGE_SEARCH
table.remarks: A table that maps stage numbers on to actual xenbase stages, this is useful for stages like NF stage 29 and 30 where there are two numbers

table.name: STAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.STAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (STAGE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ID, POSITION, ORGANISM_ID, DBXREF_ID, MODIFIED_BY, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, RANK, LEAF_NODE, STAGE_NUMBER,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.STAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: STANDARD_IMAGE
table.remarks: This stores the standard image, up to 500x500px . This image may have been compressed or format changed from the original submission.

column.name: HEIGHT
column.remarks: Image height in pixels

column.name: WIDTH
column.remarks: Image height in pixes

column.name: SOURCE
column.remarks: The actual source for the image

column.name: SIZE
column.remarks: size of the image in kilobytes

column.name: IS_ORIGINAL
column.remarks: indicates if this is the unaltered original submitted by the user

table.name: STANDARD_IMAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.STANDARD_IMAGE_incl_del_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, IS_ORIGINAL, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.IMAGE_ID, t.HEIGHT, t.WIDTH, t.SIZE, t.IS_ORIGINAL, t.TYPE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.STANDARD_IMAGE t UNION SELECT a.IMAGE_ID, a.HEIGHT, a.WIDTH, a.SIZE, a.IS_ORIGINAL, a.TYPE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_STANDARD_IMAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: STANDARD_IMAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.STANDARD_IMAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, IS_ORIGINAL, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.STANDARD_IMAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: STANDARDSPECIMENVIEW
table.remarks: This table lists allowable views for specimens

column.name: START_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: This is the starting stage for which a particular view is allowable

column.name: END_STAGE_ID
column.remarks: the end stage for which a particular view is allowable

column.name: SECTION
column.remarks: what is the section of the view is it a whole view or transverse - indicating the specimen has been cut to reveal anatomy.

table.name: STANDARDSPECIMENVIEW_PORTION
table.remarks: This table restricts the section type of StandardSpecimenView to whole or transverse

table.name: SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE
table.remarks: Some images will have supplemental versions. This may be a larger version of the image. If the image submitted had to be reduced in size, resolution or had to have its format changed the submitted image may be stored as a supplemental image.

column.name: HEIGHT
column.remarks: Image height in pixels

column.name: WIDTH
column.remarks: Image height in pixes

column.name: SOURCE
column.remarks: The actual source for the image

column.name: SIZE
column.remarks: size of the image in kilobytes

column.name: IS_ORIGINAL
column.remarks: indicates if this image is the unaltered original submission.

table.name: SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE_incl_del_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, IS_ORIGINAL, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.IMAGE_ID, t.HEIGHT, t.WIDTH, t.SIZE, t.IS_ORIGINAL, t.TYPE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE t UNION SELECT a.IMAGE_ID, a.HEIGHT, a.WIDTH, a.SIZE, a.IS_ORIGINAL, a.TYPE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, IS_ORIGINAL, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SUPPLEMENTAL_IMAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: SUPPLIER
table.remarks: Possible supplers. This is an aggreage of organizations, labs, and persons.

column.name: PERSON_ID
column.remarks: Identifier for the table

table.name: SUPPLIER_DB
table.remarks: Product databases/catalogues for a supplier.

table.name: SYNONYM
table.remarks: A synonym for a feature. One feature can have multiple synonyms, and the same synonym can apply to multiple features

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: The synonym itself. Should be human-readable machine-searchable ascii text

column.name: TYPE_ID
column.remarks: types would be symbol and fullname for now

column.name: SYNONYM_SGML
column.remarks: The fully specified synonym, with any non-ascii characters encoded in SGML

table.name: SYNONYM_IDX3_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."SYNONYM_IDX3_V"("K00") AS SELECT LOWER("NAME") FROM "DB2INST1"."SYNONYM"

table.name: SYNONYM_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SYNONYM_incl_del_v (SYNONYM_ID, NAME, TYPE_ID, SYNONYM_SGML, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.SYNONYM_ID, t.NAME, t.TYPE_ID, t.SYNONYM_SGML, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.SYNONYM t UNION SELECT a.SYNONYM_ID, a.NAME, a.TYPE_ID, a.SYNONYM_SGML, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_SYNONYM a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: SYNONYM_SCOPE
table.remarks: describes the scope of the synonym (exact, narrow, broad, etc)

table.name: SYNONYM_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.SYNONYM_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (SYNONYM_ID, NAME, TYPE_ID, SYNONYM_SGML, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.SYNONYM_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: SYNONYM_TYPE
table.remarks: describes what type of synonym it is (e.g. plural)

table.name: T20080813_170941
table.remarks: Maintains state of soap requests being sent, number of retries, failures, success, timestamps

column.name: XML_REQUEST
column.remarks: Has the xml document in the SOAP Message, usually wrapped in CDATA to escape xml in the SOAP Request.

column.name: STATE
column.remarks: State of the soap request sent, based on response recieved, 0 for fail, 1 for success.

column.name: ATTEMPTS
column.remarks: Number of attempts made to send a request.

column.name: OBJECT_ID
column.remarks: Object for which the request is being sent.

column.name: TIMESTAMP
column.remarks: Time on which the request was sent.

column.name: NOTIFICATION
column.remarks: Notification means email sent to someone, 1 for yes, 0 for no.

column.name: OBJECT_TYPE
column.remarks: TYPE of object for future use, right now null would indicate a LINE.

table.name: TABLE_ANNOTATION_STATUS
table.remarks: indicates which annotatins statuses can apply to which tables

table.name: TEXTPRESSO_WORK
table.remarks: Work table for the textpresso application

table.name: THUMBNAIL_IMAGE
table.remarks: This stores the thumbnail image, up to 152x152px . This image may have been compressed or format changed from the original submission.

column.name: HEIGHT
column.remarks: Image height in pixels

column.name: WIDTH
column.remarks: Image height in pixes

column.name: SOURCE
column.remarks: The actual source for the image

column.name: SIZE
column.remarks: size of the image in kilobytes

table.name: THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_INCL_DEL_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_incl_del_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT t.IMAGE_ID, t.HEIGHT, t.WIDTH, t.SIZE, t.TYPE, t.CREATED_BY, t.CREATED_AT, t.MODIFIED_BY, t.MODIFIED_AT, coalesce(t.modified_at, t.created_at) as transaction_time, CASE WHEN t.modified_at IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS transaction_date FROM DB2INST1.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE t UNION SELECT a.IMAGE_ID, a.HEIGHT, a.WIDTH, a.SIZE, a.TYPE, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_AT, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type FROM DB2INST1.AUDIT_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE a WHERE transaction_type = 'D'

table.name: THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_SINCE_LAST_SRCHINDX_GEN_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW DB2INST1.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_since_last_srchindx_gen_v (IMAGE_ID, HEIGHT, WIDTH, SIZE, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT,transaction_date, transaction_type) AS SELECT * FROM DB2INST1.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_incl_del_v WHERE transaction_date > (select time from last_search_index_v)

table.name: UMB_GENE_JGI_FEATS_MQT
table.viewSql: CREATE TABLE umb_gene_jgi_feats_mqt AS (select f1.feature_id as gene_id, f3.feature_id as jgi_gene_id, f4.feature_id as jgi_mrna_id, f5.feature_id as jgi_polypeptide_id from feature f1, dbxref d, feature_relationship fr1, feature f2, feature_relationship fr2, feature f3, feature_relationship fr3, feature f4, feature_relationship fr4, feature f5 where f1.type_id=1214 AND f1.organism_id=11 AND d.dbxref_id=f1.dbxref_id AND d.db_id = 44 AND fr1.object_id=f1.feature_id AND fr1.type_id=500 AND fr1.subject_id=f2.feature_id AND f2.type_id=1214 AND f2.organism_id=12 AND fr2.subject_id=f2.feature_id AND fr2.type_id=38 AND fr2.object_id=f3.feature_id AND f3.type_id=1214 AND fr3.object_id=f3.feature_id AND fr3.type_id=607 AND fr3.subject_id=f4.feature_id AND f4.type_id=738 AND fr4.object_id=f4.feature_id AND fr4.type_id=607 AND fr4.subject_id=f5.feature_id AND f5.type_id=606) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: UMBRELLA_GENE_V
table.viewSql: create view db2inst1.umbrella_gene_v as (select * from feature where type_id = 1214 and organism_id = 11)

table.name: USER_ACCOUNT
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW "DB2INST1"."USER_ACCOUNT" ("PERSON_ID", "USER_NAME", "FIRST_NAME", "LAST_NAME", "PASS_WORD", "ADMINISTRATOR", "ENABLED", "LAST_LOGIN", "PRIVILEGE", "BUILT_IN") AS SELECT person_id, user_name, first_name, last_name, pass_word, administrator, enabled, last_login, privilege, built_in FROM PERSON

table.name: VARIETY
table.remarks: Describes some variety in a line.

table.name: XB_EXT_REL_HGNC_PIVOT_RPT_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view db2inst1.xb_ext_rel_hgnc_pivot_rpt_v as with m1 as ( select XENBASE_GENE_ID ,SYMBOL ,NCBI_TAXON ,ENTREZ_GENE_ID ,ENSEMBL ,HGNC_ID ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_SYMBOL ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_ENTREZ
,DECODE(DB_ID,131,MODEL_NAME) JGI_XL_Genome_7_1_gene, DECODE(DB_ID,139,MODEL_NAME) JGI_XL_Genome_9_1_gene, DECODE(DB_ID,148,MODEL_NAME) XB_XL_Genome_9_2_gene, DECODE(DB_ID,109,MODEL_NAME) JGI_XT_Genome_7_1_gene, DECODE(DB_ID,135,MODEL_NAME) JGI_XT_Genome_8_0_gene, DECODE(DB_ID,143,MODEL_NAME) XB_XT_Genome_9_1_gene
from db2inst1.xb_ext_rel_hgnc_rpt_v ) select XENBASE_GENE_ID ,SYMBOL ,ENTREZ_GENE_ID
, LISTAGG(distinct JGI_XL_Genome_7_1_gene,'|') as JGI_XL_Genome_7_1_gene , LISTAGG(distinct JGI_XL_Genome_9_1_gene,'|') as JGI_XL_Genome_9_1_gene , LISTAGG(distinct XB_XL_Genome_9_2_gene,'|') as XB_XL_Genome_9_2_gene , LISTAGG(distinct JGI_XT_Genome_7_1_gene,'|') as JGI_XT_Genome_7_1_gene , LISTAGG(distinct JGI_XT_Genome_8_0_gene,'|') as JGI_XT_Genome_8_0_gene , LISTAGG(distinct XB_XT_Genome_9_1_gene,'|') as XB_XT_Genome_9_1_gene
,ENSEMBL ,HGNC_ID ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_SYMBOL ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_ENTREZ -- exclude from final report , NCBI_TAXON
from m1 group by XENBASE_GENE_ID , SYMBOL , NCBI_TAXON ,ENTREZ_GENE_ID ,ENSEMBL ,HGNC_ID ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_SYMBOL ,ORTHOLOG_HUMAN_ENTREZ --order by NCBI_Taxon

table.name: XB_EXT_REL_HGNC_RPT_V
table.viewSql:
create or replace view db2inst1.xb_ext_rel_hgnc_rpt_v as WITH genes AS ( SELECT g.gene_ID, g.symbol, g.organism_id, f.feature_id as genepage_ID, f.full_name as genepage_Name FROM genes_MQT g, feature f, feature_relationship fr WHERE g.organism_id IN (12,13) AND g.gene_id = fr.subject_id AND f.feature_id = fr.object_id AND fr.type_id = 500 AND f.type_id = 1214 AND f.organism_id = 11 -- and g.symbol = 'pax8' -- and g.symbol like 'pax%' -- and g.symbol like 'tmem184b.L%' ) ,entrez as ( SELECT g.gene_id, LISTAGG(dbx.accession,'|') as entrez FROM genes g, feature_dbxref fdb, dbxref dbx WHERE g.gene_id = fdb.feature_id AND fdb.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id AND dbx.db_id = 46 GROUP BY g.gene_id ) ,ensembl as ( SELECT g.gene_id, LISTAGG(dbx.accession,'|') as ensembl FROM dbxref dbx, feature_dbxref fdbx, feature f, feature_relationship fr, genes g WHERE g.gene_id = fr.object_id AND f.feature_id = fr.subject_id AND f.feature_id = fdbx.feature_id AND fdbx.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id AND dbx.db_id = 99 GROUP BY g.gene_id ) ,orthohuman as ( SELECT g.gene_id, LISTAGG(f.name,'|') as ortholog_human_symbol , LISTAGG(dbx.accession,'|') as ortholog_human_entrez FROM genes g, feature f , feature_relationship fr, feature_dbxref fd , dbxref dbx WHERE fr.object_id = g.genepage_ID --483692 -- pax8 AND fr.type_id = 1522 AND fr.subject_id = f.feature_id AND fd.feature_id = f.feature_id AND fd.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id AND f.organism_id = 1 -- human AND dbx.db_id = 46 -- entrez gene GROUP BY g.gene_id ) , gene_model AS ( SELECT g.gene_id, dbx.db_id, db.name dbName, m.name model_name, m.feature_id model_feature_id --, LISTAGG(m.name, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY m.name DESC) as JGI_models2 FROM genes g, feature_relationship fr, feature m, dbxref dbx, db WHERE g.gene_id = fr.object_id AND m.feature_id = fr.subject_id AND fr.type_id = 67 AND dbx.dbxref_id = m.dbxref_id AND -- dbx.db_id IN (127,131,139,109) -- 103 is XT 4.1, 135 is XT 8.0 neither are really accurate/great -- dbx.db_id IN (103, 109, 127, 131, 135, 139, 143, 148) -- 109 is XT 7.1, 131 is XL 7.1, 139 is XL9.1, 143 is XT9.1, 148 is XL9.2 dbx.db_id IN (109, 131, 135, 139, 143, 148) -- 109 is XT 7.1, 131 is XL 7.1, 139 is XL9.1, 143 is XT9.1, 148 is XL9.2 excl. 103 4.1 and 127 6.0 AND dbx.db_id = db.db_id -- GROUP BY g.gene_id, dbx.db_id, db.name ), jgi_model ( gene_id, db_id, dbName, model_name, --model_geneId, --model_geneName, --model_version, mrnaId, mrnaName --, mrnaSeq --,polypeptideId, --polypeptideName, --polypeptideSeq, --proteinId ) as ( select gm.gene_id, gm.db_id, gm.dbName, gm.model_name, -- f1.feature_id as model_geneId, -- f1.name as model_geneName, -- fp.value as model_version, f2.feature_id as mrnaId, f2.name as mrnaName -- , f2.residues as mrnaSeq -- ,f3.feature_id as polypeptideId, -- f3.name as polypeptideName, -- f3.residues as polypeptideSeq, -- d2.accession as proteinId from --feature_relationship fr1, feature f1, -- featureprop fp, feature_relationship fr2, feature f2, -- feature_relationship fr3, -- feature f3, -- dbxref d2, gene_model gm where 1=1 AND --f1.feature_id = gm.model_feature_id AND f1.name = gm.model_name AND --f1.name = gm.jgi_id AND --'Xetro.C00299' AND -- gfra2 --fr1.object_id=#{geneFeatureId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND --fr1.type_id=134 AND --f1.feature_id=fr1.subject_id AND --f1.type_id=1214 AND --fp.feature_id=f1.feature_id AND --fp.type_id=73 AND fr2.object_id=f1.feature_id AND fr2.type_id=607 AND --fr2.r_rank = 1 AND f2.feature_id=fr2.subject_id AND f2.type_id=738 --AND --fr3.object_id=f2.feature_id AND --fr3.type_id=607 AND --f3.feature_id=fr3.subject_id AND --f3.type_id=606 -- AND d2.dbxref_id=f3.dbxref_id
), mrna_transcript AS ( SELECT g.gene_id, g.db_id, g.dbName, LISTAGG(g.mrnaname, '|') as mRNA_Transcript FROM jgi_model g WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY g.gene_id, g.db_id, g.dbName ) ,hgnc as ( SELECT g.gene_id --, LISTAGG(f.name,'|') as ortholog_human_symbol , LISTAGG(dbx.accession,'|') as hgnc_id FROM genes g, feature f , feature_relationship fr, feature_dbxref fd , dbxref dbx WHERE fr.object_id = g.genepage_ID --483692 -- pax8 AND fr.type_id = 1522 AND fr.subject_id = f.feature_id AND fd.feature_id = f.feature_id AND fd.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id AND f.organism_id = 1 -- human AND dbx.db_id = 770 -- hgnc GROUP BY g.gene_id ) ,JGI AS ( SELECT g.gene_id, g.db_id, g.dbName, LISTAGG(g.model_name, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY g.model_name DESC) as JGI_models
FROM gene_model g GROUP BY g.gene_id, g.db_id, g.dbName )
SELECT concat('XB-GENE-',g.gene_id) as Xenbase_Gene_ID, g.symbol --, g.genepage_Name , concat('XB-GENEPAGE-',g.genepage_ID) as Xenbase_Genepage_id , mrt.mRNA_Transcript XENBASE_TRANSCRIPT_ID , e.entrez as ENTREZ_GENE_ID , jgi.JGI_models model_name , etl_stage.SPLIT(2,'-', jgi.JGI_models ) ncbi_gene_id , jgi.db_id , jgi.dbName genome_assembly , mbl.ensembl , r.hgnc_id , s.ortholog_human_symbol , s.ortholog_human_entrez -- exclude from final report output, but needed here to split the data , CASE WHEN g.organism_id = 13 THEN '8355' WHEN g.organism_id = 12 THEN '8364' END as NCBI_Taxon FROM genes g LEFT JOIN entrez e ON g.gene_id = e.gene_id LEFT JOIN orthohuman s ON g.gene_id = s.gene_id LEFT JOIN JGI ON g.gene_id = jgi.gene_id LEFT JOIN hgnc r ON g.gene_id = r.gene_id LEFT JOIN mrna_transcript mrt ON g.gene_id = mrt.gene_id LEFT JOIN ensembl mbl ON g.gene_id = mbl.gene_id WHERE jgi.db_id = mrt.db_id

table.name: XB_TABLES
table.remarks: For storing metadata about tables that compose Xenbase. Currently does not include any staging tables or metadat tables.

column.name: ABBREV
column.remarks: A short abbreviation for a tablename used to construct abbreviations

column.name: AUDITED
column.remarks: indicates if this table is audited

table.name: XEN_GENE_V
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.xen_gene_v AS SELECT g.*, u.feature_id as umbrella_gene_id, u.name as umbrella_gene_symbol FROM feature g, feature_relationship fr, feature u WHERE g.type_id = 1214 AND g.organism_id IN (12,13) AND g.feature_id = fr.subject_id AND fr.type_id = 500 AND fr.object_id = u.feature_id

table.name: XENOPUS_GENE_SYNONYMS_MQT
table.remarks: This is an artificial MQT for xenopus genes with their synonyms
table.viewSql: create table xenopus_gene_synonyms_mqt AS ( select f.feature_id as gene_id, f.name as gene_symbol, s.synonym_id as synonym_id, LOWER(s.name) as synonym_name from feature f left join feature_synonym fs ON f.feature_id=fs.feature_id left join synonym s ON (s.synonym_id=fs.synonym_id AND s.type_id=46) where f.organism_id=11 AND f.type_id=1214 ) DATA INITIALLY DEFERRED REFRESH DEFERRED ENABLE QUERY OPTIMIZATION MAINTAINED BY SYSTEM IN "XB_4K_PAGE_TAB" INDEX IN "XB_4K_PAGE_IDX" LONG IN "XB_4K_PAGE_LRG" NOT LOGGED INITIALLY ORGANIZE BY ROW

table.name: XT_SS_V
table.remarks: Summarized the Join from ExpressionTest through expression_stages_tested and specimange_stages
table.viewSql: CREATE VIEW db2inst1.xt_ss_v AS SELECT et.feature_id AS probe_id , et.experiment_id , es.name AS experiment_source , es.experimentsource_id , et.expressiontest_id , est.expressionstagestested_id, est.specimenstages_id , ss.specimen_id , ss.start_stage_id , ss.end_stage_id , ss.stage_resolution_id , CASE WHEN ( ( sStart.name = 'unspecified stage' ) OR ( sEnd.name = 'unspecified stage' ) ) THEN sStart.stage_number WHEN ( sStart.name = sEnd.name ) THEN sStart.name WHEN ( sStart.name != sEnd.name ) THEN sStart.name || ' to ' || sEnd.stage_number END AS stage_text , sStart.name start_stage_name , sEnd.name end_stage_name , sStart.rank start_stage_rank , sEnd.rank end_stage_rank , sStart.stage_number start_stage_number , sEnd.stage_number end_stage_number , sr.name stage_resolution FROM expressiontest et , experimentsource es , experiment e , expression_stages_tested est, specimen_stages ss , stage sStart , stage sEnd , stage_resolution sr WHERE et.expressiontest_id = est.expressiontest_id AND et.experiment_id = e.experiment_id AND e.experimentsource_id = es.experimentsource_id AND est.specimenstages_id = ss.specimenstages_id AND ss.start_stage_id = sStart.stage_id AND ss.end_stage_id = sEnd.stage_id AND ss.stage_resolution_id = sr.stage_resolution_id
